description: Turn your Android phone into a digital magnifying glass with built-in flashlight. It's great for when you need to read tiny print and for when you just can't be bothered to put on your glasses or contacts. You can even use it at restaurants, movie theaters, or anywhere else with low light. Keep your phone at least 4 inches (10 cm) away from the object to focus. Use the controls to focus, turn the flashlight on or off, show a negative image, and take a picture. Also, you can use these gestures anywhere on the screen: - Double-tap: Zoom out/in - Single-tap: Focus - Long-press: Turn light on/off

Chromecast devices allow you to stream media to your TV or speakers using your phone, tablet or laptop. Cast your favorite content from your apps on your iPhone®, iPad®, Android device, or laptop right to the biggest screen and best speakers in the home. The Chromecast app is your one-stop shop for exploring what you can do with Chromecast. Use the Chromecast app to: • Easily browse trending and popular content from your Cast-enabled apps • Explore and discover more Cast-enabled apps to watch, listen to and play on your TV • Use voice search to find content by movie, TV show or actor • Play, pause and change volume across all your Chromecast devices. • Customize your TV screen with beautiful imagery • Plus, find the latest on new apps, offers, and features added to your Chromecast. * Some features not available in all countries
release_text: • Easy access to all your offers in one place. Find it in the navigation drawer. • Bug fixes

description: Touch icon and put the phone on silent mode, touch again and back to previous profile. Mute all (ringer, audio/video players, notifications ...) except alarm. Put application shortcut on wallpaper to quick switch MUTE ON/OFF. If you like it, please donate this app on: https://market.android.com/details?id=net.mnocompany.muter
release_text: Fix for Lollipop (5.0) and for 5.1 put in priority mode but still mute ring, notification and music! Added new languages, KO, PT, NO, SV, ES

description: Thanks so much for downloading Funny kitty pet. It's a free program which will bring new friend to you! And if seriously it will show you running cat all over the screen. You'll really love it! App has several options available which allows your to control your pet's motion, like closer, further or whimsical. Also you can control pet's transparency. In your Notification bar you can always "pause" your pet, it will fall asleep. If you want to change your android pet you can choose another skin, like dog, rabbit, orange kitty or hamster. Basically this is an Android version of neko (or nekoDA, xneko, oneko, etc...). I hope you'll like my app and will take a look into my other applications. You can use this app as a live wallpaper. Just set some nice home screen picture and your pet will leave on it :) Please, let me know your feedback.

The "Tuiter" bird enjoys a relaxing day in its summer house. Enjoying the sun, weather and an aura of peace that allows him to rest from the noisy town, he performs his vacation duties... until he craves for a drink. Help Tuiter to get to the store! (If he ever gets there). Use your finger to guide Tuiter in our parody of the famous mobile game "Flappy Bird"!
release_text: - Now the device "BACK" button allows you to fully close the application and return to main screen from the credits section. - Ads removed from credits section. - Unnecessary permissions removed.

description: Self Meal Guide is the perfect pocket cookbook, you can find recipes based on favorite ingredients( mark / check ingredient icons in Grocery Aisle before you click Search Recipes button). NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED! The Free version has only 40 recipes available( but you can purchase the payed version to have 195 recipes and No Advertising! ) FREE recipes! ALL RECIPES: - Search recipes by name - All recipes list - Order by calories option( menu buttons) CHAPTERS: - All recipes organized in chapters, for quick access Sides Main Dishes( Beef, Casserole, Chicken, Crock Pot, Lamb, Pork, Turkey, Vegetables) Desserts Pastas Appetizers( Beverages, Breads, Canapes, Cheese, Dips, Finger Foods, Nuts, Salsa) Salads Soup MEAL PLAN: - This is the list of favorite recipes - Add recipes to it for easy access later on GROCERY LIST: - all ingredients contained in the recipes from Meal Plan. + Uncheck All + Delete Checked Items + Delete All GROCERY AISLE: - A grid of ingredient types, for easy access. - Baked products, Baking products, Beverages, Bread, Candy, Dairy, Pasta, and more. - Click( touch) ingredients to include them in search , before pressing the Search Recipes button. - Long click on ingredients for details. SEARCH RESULT: - includes a list of previously checked ingredients( you can exclude ingredients from the current search) - includes a list of matched recipes, with details( matched percentage, count of matched ingredients in recipe, and more) SELECTED RECIPE RESULT: - If you click on a recipe from the list of matched recipes you can view recipes details. - Ingredients and recipes photos. - Add to Meal Plan option ( with meal time: breakfast, lunch, dinner and more). - Previously checked ingredients appear with green background. - Click on ingredient for details( includes ingredient nutrition facts, measure description, weight, add ingredient to Grocery List and more). RECIPE: - Same as SELECTED RECIPE RESULT, without the matching details. - Photos of recipe and ingredients. - Add to Meal Plan option ( with meal time: breakfast, lunch, dinner and more). - Ingredients with quantities list. - Click on ingredient for details. - Instructions. - Comments. - Recipe nutrition. Application Features: - It is a project that is constantly evolving. - Complete recipes directions, ingredients and reviews. - Cookbook is organized by chapters for easy access. - Save your shopping list to help you later when doing grocery shopping. - Have a more healthy food menu for free. - Impress friends and family with great meals.Find food that fits their diet. - Calories and nutritional information are available for most recipes. - Find just what you’re looking for with advanced search capabilities. - Take recipes in the kitchen, to the store, on vacation - no cookbooks or recipe cards! - Order recipes by dietary constraint. - Exclude multiple ingredients when searching. - Save and re-use menus for one or more meals. - Save time and money planning for everyday meals and special occasions. - Bring your grocery list along to the store and check off items while shopping. - The recipes include nutritional information on calories, protein, carbs, fat, saturated fat, fibre, sugar and more. - It has tons of recipe categories including main dishes, appetizers, drinks, side dishes, desserts, soups, stews and more. Self Meal Guide brings you the best-of-the-best recipes, secrets and tips with photos of every recipe and every ingredient. This allows you to easily select and check ingredients for recipes search. It includes Grocery Aisle feature which lets you to find out the matching recipes with the ingredients in hand, fridge, or just your favorite ingredients. This feature has advanced matching capabilities which generates accurate search results that are grouped in a fancy manner :) Download it now and enjoy our delicious FREE recipes! Your feedback is very much appreciated, so please don't hesitate to contact us! Thank You!

Hex Filler is an interesting game with pretty simple rules - you just need to occupy more than a half of colored hexagons on the board and you win! Everybody can play this game: - If you need to develop your strategic thinking you can play versus artificial intelligence. - If you want to have fun or just kill some time - find a friend and play together. - If your day was very hard - turn on this game and use it like an antistress and antidepressant Inside you will find: - A lot of fun. - Several game modes - player-vs-player and player-vs-AI. - Beautiful cells of 6 different colors. - Pleasant music. - Quite serious opponent. Some notes: - Use side control buttons to perform move. - In player-vs-player mode first move owner is random, but in player-vs-AI it's you. Enjoy the play!

The new Ottawa Citizen app for smartphone provides a live feed of news and information, custom-written and designed for audiences on the move. What you need to know right now, no fluff. Direct, concise and with a distinct voice for audiences to skim, share and talk about. • Breaking News Alerts: News as it happens. • Stories come to life: Award winning photos and unique videos. • Tap less – read more: Find relevant news faster with the “Related Articles” feature. • Read offline: Downloaded articles are ready to read anytime. • Spread the news: Share the latest news via email, Facebook and Twitter.
release_text: Newly designed UI: The newly designed user interface provides users with easier navigation, better presentation of content and an overall better reading experience. OC Now: A new section called OC Now has been introduced in this release. The OC Now section provides you with the most relevant news across all categories for Ottawa at the moment.

description: This is a plugin for the new Sony SmartWatch device and Torque - it allows you to display gauges from the Torque Pro OBD application on the remote display, so you can have a small digital (or gauge) readout on a separate location of your car Imagine being able to keep your phone in your pocket and still be able to see a digital boost gauge readout on the LiveView display, or any other OBD2 sensor that Torque can read. The plugins display will even match the graphical theme you have selected in Torque itself! The 'SmartWatch' device is a little 'remote display'. You can find them on sites like ebay and they're not too expensive. Please note: This plugin needs a handset which can handle multiple bluetooth concurrent connections in a reliable manner. Not all handsets are able to do this due to various bluetooth driver bugs so some phones may be a little troublesome to setup.

Otevřeli jsme pro Vás nový, moderní a kompletně zrekonstruovaný music & cocktail bar v centru Prahy, který vznikl oživením prostoru s tradicí sahající až do roku 1992, kdy začal psát historii tohoto místa legendární club Sparing. Novým oficiálním názvem je RODEO – music & cocktail bar. Samotný název napovídá, že se u nás rozhodně nudit nebudete, čeká Vám mnoho nekonečných a tematických večerů, hudebních produkcí a hlavně zábavy. V aplikaci RODEO bar najdete celý nápojový lístek s náhledy drinků a zajímavé informace o nich. Speciální akce, které se konají v RODEO baru a akční drinky. Po propojení aplikace s facebookovým účtem můžete v baru vstoupit do RODEO chatu a psát barmankám nebo ostatním hostům. Pomocí aplikace si lze jednoduše zavolat SpeedCars taxi. Samozřejmostí je kontakt.

A super simple stopwatch, precise and easy-to-use. - favorite layout color can be selected - portrait and landscape mode (for tablets) - optional with accoustic feedback - stopped times can be sent as text or .csv - stopwatch keeps running in background - app can be moved to sd-card Please write an email if you have any suggestions or problems. If you like the app, a nice comment would make me happy :) ++ Permission "storage - modify/delete SD card contents" is needed to create the csv-file ++

description: Now full coverage of the country. 24 top banks. Toata Romania top 24 de banci. Android application that will help you find the closest ATM of your favourite bank in Romania. Over 7000 ATMs. Choose between 24 top banks in the country. Features: - Over 7000 ATM covering the whole country containing the top 24 banks in Romania. - Searching for specific location - Finding ATMs near your current position - Google Maps v2 integration, rotating, tilting and of course 3D buildings. - New feature to find top 20 banks in the area currently in view. - Clustering to help you better browse the country, the city so you can find the closes ATM as fast as possible - Ability to click on ATM find details and use Google Navigation to help you find directions to the selected ATM. More info and support on: https://www.facebook.com/CautATM

description: The sequel to the hugely popular 'Mystery Lighthouse' is now available! The adventure continues... Uncle Augustus is missing and it is down to you to find him. The story picks up where Mystery Lighthouse Part 1' left off - with you flying out into space in your rocket powered lighthouse! You think Uncle Augustus is on Saturn and so that's where you are heading... In this classic point and click adventure you'll explore a strange new world, unearth clues, solve puzzles and finally discover the amazing secret of the mystery lighthouse. Features: + A classic point and click adventure game. + Charming hand-illustrated imagery. + An original and unique storyline. + Many items to collect and puzzles to solve. + Game auto-saves as you progress. Note: This game is English language. Digi-Chain Games on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DigiChainGames Digi-Chain Games on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DigiChainGames
release_text: Version 3.0: Game engine update. Increased compatibility with all devices.

description: [실용한자 3500 완전정복] 어플의 모든기능을 체험할 수 있는 무료 체험판입니다. [실용한자 3500 완전정복] 소개 ------------------ 국가공인 실용한자 능력평가 시험 기준에 맞춘 3500개의 한자를 체계적으로 학습할 수 있는 최선의 방법을 지원합니다. 8급부터 1급까지 모든 한자를 추가과금없이 사용하실 수 있습니다. 깜빡이, 혹은 Flash Card 라고도 불리는 기존의 학습방식 외에도 짝맞추기, 사지선다 등의 게임형식의 학습방법을 지원합니다. 뿐만아니라 바탕화면 위젯을 지원하기때문에 핸드폰의 바탕화면 잘 보이는 곳에 위젯을 띄워 놓고 핸드폰을 볼때마다 바로바로 학습할 수도 있습니다. 위젯 기능은 바쁜일상에 잊혀져가는 학습의지를 다시금 불태워 주는 효과도 있습니다. 사용방법 - 실행시 나타나는 지도상의 점들은 하나하나의 한자를 가리킵니다. - 지도상의 특정 영역을 선택하거나, 좌측 하단의 급수별선택 메뉴를 이용하여 학습(정복)할 한자들을 선택합니다. - 나침판을 누르면 다양한 학습방법들이 나오고, 이들중 하나를 선택해 학습합니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : 010-9542-1425 서울특별시 양천구 목1동 924 KT정보전산센터 [Practical Chinese Mastering 3500] A trial to experience all the features of the application. [Practical Chinese Mastering 3500] Introduction ------------------ The best way to support the systematic study focused on the 3500 Chinese national official Chinese Proficiency Practical Test Standards. From Grade 8 to Grade 1, you can use all the kanji at no additional charge. Blinking, or Flash Card, also known as Fit pairs in addition to the existing learning methods, limb stands to support the learning process of game types, such as: Not only because it supports the desktop widget to put up a desktop widget that looks good on mobile phones where every time I see a cell phone, you can just learn it. Widgets feature also helps to burn the learning willingness to go again forgotten on a busy day. How to use - A point on the map that appears when you run will point to one of the Chinese one. - Select a particular area on the map or by using a watering selection menu on the bottom left, select the kanji learning (conquest). - Press the compass out various learning methods, learning to select one of them.

Finally a tool to easily check and verify the function of your OBD Bluetooth Adapter! This little app will save you hours of aggravation with any of the many Bluetooth OBD apps on the market by allowing you to send OBD2 PID requests to the adapter - then giving you a view of the adapters response, line by line. If your OBD Bluetooth adapter sends back all the information needed on one line, it's doing a great job, and you can rule it out as causing problems. If the adapter responds with the OBD data split and garbled across several lines, this indicates that the adapter is likely to blame for any errors your OBD app is having. Simply tap the top right button to make the device discoverable, select a connection mode with one of the buttons next to it, tap the input field at the bottom of the screen and type in a four digit PID code, such as 0104, 0105, 010c, 010d and send. The response from your OBD2 adapter will display on the screen. Tap the send button without typing in a new code, and the last code will be sent to the unit again. If you send codes in rapid succession and the returned message gets garbled or split, your adapter is too slow to keep up with most of the dashboard type apps, meaning it can't keep up wit the real-time data need. We suggest you review a good source of OBD2 PID codes before using this app because the data you send is not filtered. This means that you can send codes which will clear or reset your vehicle's diagnostic data. You can use this app to read and reset trouble codes as well.

Supports MP3, AAC, AMR and most other music formats. 1.Select mp3/music from your mobile or from Recordings. 2.Select area to be chopped from your audio. 3.Save as Ringtone/Music/Alarm/Notification. https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/114745520580079830753/114745520580079830753/about?hl=en Features included: - Record button at top left of app to record an audio/music for editing. - An Inverted Red Triangle to Select and Edit Mp3/Music from your Mobile/SD. - Option to delete (with confirmation alert) the created Ringtone/Music/Alarm/Notification Tone. - View a scrollable waveform representation of the audio file at 4 zoom levels. - Set start & end for the audio clip, using an optional touch interface. - Tap anywhere on the wave & the built-in Music player starts playing at that position. - Manually set the Start & End time(in seconds) by typing the values in text boxes at bottom of app. - Option to Name the new cut clip while saving it as Ringtone/Music/Alarm/Notification Tone. - Set the new clip as default ringtone or assign ringtone to contacts, using this ringtone editor. description: Discover a peaceful forest teeming with wildlife and surrounded by natural beauty every time you use your device. Sunlight filters through the trees as a gentle breeze rustles the leaves. Pause for reflection at the path while birds flutter past and deer graze contentedly in the rich foliage and quiet solitude of the undisturbed woods. Choose the Natural theme, and your forest becomes pristine as you discover a cascading waterfall. Or, rest at your private cabin before setting out on a hike through the woods at the pathway signs - it's all up to you! Interact with an owl or birds and watch the deer gaze at the forest. Several optional add-on packs are also available for purchase, allowing you to choose the features most meaningful to you: * The ‘Field Pack’ allows you to explore a completely new scene featuring a field of tall waving grass, butterflies, a rabbit, additional deer, and more. * In the ‘Stream Pack’, just one of the new features is a babbling brook winding through the forest while a buck sips from the clear waters in changing weather conditions, fish, squirrels, and more. * The ‘Customization Pack’ features even more personalization options such as your own text and images in the scene, dynamic time of day, fireflies at night, and more. * The 'Northern Woodlands Pack' includes fully animated Elk, Moose, and Bear, and a Winter environment with snow. *** NEW 2013-08-13 *** In the next few hours will release an update that fixes the login into game --- Play free online. Live Spades. Bids, blinds and bags. Online play alone or with a friend. Spades is a partnership trick-taking card game devised in the United States in the 1930s, in which the object is for each pair or partnership to take at least the number of tricks they bid on before Spades play is began. Spades is a descendant of the Whist family of card games, which also includes Bridge, Hearts, and Oh, Hell. Spades major difference as compared to other whist variants is that, instead of trump being decided by the highest bidder or at random, the spade suit is always trump, hence the name - Spades. online spades, free spades, play spades, cards spades, multiplayer spades. Intuitive and easy to use, children can safely play with this app by themselves or alternatively share the fun with a little help from their parents. Features: •Four My First Animal games: o Mothers & Babies – touch the spots to reveal and match mother animals to their babies in this memory game o Missing Letter – drag the correct letter into the word to name the animal o Animal Puzzle – place the correct pieces into the puzzle o Animal Painter – choose from different textures such as ‘spotted or ‘fluffy’ to paint the animal; the right choice will reveal if you’re right! •Two extra play environments: o Magnets – drag and drop animal pictures and words on different habitat backgrounds o Animal zoo – dictionary that allows children to learn animal words and sounds •Handy hints to help children complete the games •Amazing illustrations, animations, and sound effects throughout making it a fully interactive experience •Choice of UK or US voiceover – simply change your device system settings About DK We are award-winning publishers for adults and children. We craft illustrated reference products – books, ebooks, and apps – for people in more than 100 countries and 60 languages. Founded in London in 1974, we are enormously proud to be the world’s leading illustrated reference publisher. description: JACC is an acronym for Just Another Carb Counter. You may wonder why the world needs another food nutrition application since so many exist already. JACC attempts to be the easiest food nutrition application you'll ever use. Wouldn't we all rather be doing something more exciting than looking up nutrition data? JACC uses a local copy of the USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference to provide basic nutrient data for 8463 foods. You choose the food and serving information, and JACC calculates the following information for your selection: Calories, total fat, saturated fat, polyunsaturated fat, monounsaturated fat, cholesterol, sodium, total carbohydrate, dietary fiber, sugars, and protein. Try it out and see what you think. If you really like something, or really don't, feel free to leave a comment. And remember, if you're not using Green Icon Software, you're not using JACC. Known issues: Search order matters. For example, "bread banana" yields slightly different results than "banana bread". If you don't find the food that you are expecting, try changing the order of your search terms. This will hopefully be fixed in a future release. Thank you: A special thanks to the men and women at the U.S. Department of Agriculture for doing the hard work of collecting the nutrition information and assembling it into a database for the benefit of us all. The nutrition information used in this application comes from the following source: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Agricultural Research Service. 2013. USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference, Release 26. Nutrient Data Laboratory Home Page, http://www.ars.usda.gov/nutrientdata

Sigma Matematik har allt inom matte du kan önska dig och lite till! Nu i samarbete med mattecentrum.se! Matteappen Sigma är anpassad för gymnasiereformen GY2011 vilket innebär bland annat att kursnamnen har ändrats och att matematik E och matematik diskret delvis har förts samman i Matte 5. Även om du läser matte på högstadiet eller på högskola kan du ha användning för Sigma då bland annat kurs 1 innefattar högstadiematematiken och högskolekurser så som Diskret matematik och Matematik för ekonomer delar innehåll med de högre gymnasiekurserna. Appen är dessutom perfekt för de som vill träna sin huvudräkning inför högskoleprovet. Om du gillar appens koncept och vill att den ska utvecklas så kan du ranka appen högt och tipsa dina vänner! Tack! Donatorer: Jakob S. Simon L. Tomas Hedborg Mikael B. Joséphine Teknisk information: ★Sigma stödjer de vanligaste skärmupplösningarna, bland andra QVGA, HVGA och WVGA. ★Sigma fungerar för Android 1.6 och uppåt ★Sigma stödjer Apps2SD för android 2.2 och uppåt ★Appen begär interneträttigheter för att kunna länka till bland annat wikipedia.org och mattecentrum.se, ingen nätverksdata används så länge du inte trycker på de länkarna. ★Skrytfunktionen fungerar inte smärtfritt med den officiella Facebook appen, det är ett problem på deras sida så om du vill skryta via Facebook får du välja t.ex. att skryta via sms och sedan kopiera texten från meddelandet. ★Som sista utväg ifall appen skulle krångla så kan du "rensa användardata" i appens inställningar för att lösa det.
release_text: 1.1.0 ★ Ny övning: Division ★ Ökad variation i procent och bråk övningarna ★ Ändrat utseende på sjuor för att skilja mer från ettor ★ Förbättrat utseende i enhetskonverteraren ★ Nya medaljer ★ Fixat svarsalternativ i addition och subtraktionsövningarna ★ Jämnat ut poängberäkningen mellan övningarna för jämnare poäng (testas) ★ Lagt till meny till meny-knappen för genvägar ★ Förberett för online highscore i framtida uppdatering ★ Förbättrad textformatering i bland annat Primitv funktion övningen

description: "My DC Metro" provides arrival times for Metro trains and buses operating in the DC Metropolitan area; never again rush to a station or bus stop to only see that the next train or bus will arrive in 15 minutes. With My DC Metro, you will always know the arrival times for your favorite stations and bus stops. With the Metro entrances and WMATA bus stops maps, commuters will know the quickest way to access the WMATA system. With the newly added "Alerts" tabs, you will always be informed of all Metro rail and bus delays & alerts allowing you to make the appropriate transportation decision. Additionally, elevator and escalator outages are provided for your favorite stations. With "My DC Metro", anyone will be able to quickly navigate the WMATA Metro system like a seasoned veteran. No network connection while travelling between stations, no problem; "My DC Metro - Rail" will immediately start estimating arrival times based upon the previous update; and once the connection is restored, "My DC Metro - Rail" automatically retrieves new data from the WMATA server ensuring that your information is up to date. "My DC Metro" preserves your battery life; when no data has been display for 15 minutes, the app shuts down automatically. "My DC Metro - Rail" provides the following features: * Displays arrival times for your favorite stations * Displays Metro rail delays and alerts * Displays elevator and escalator outages * Displays Entrances (including elevators) locations for the Metro System * Provide an Adobe PDF format map of the Metro System. * Provides an adjustable update rate (15, 30, 60 seconds) via settings * Provide a Help Display explaining primary functionality "My DC Metro - Bus" provides the following features: * Displays arrival times for your favorite bus stops * Displays WMATA bus alerts and delays * Displays bus stop located within 1/2 mile of your current location * Provides the ability to add bus stops via the bus stop map Known issue(s) * Terminal stations do not display predicted train arrival times. Researching a work-a-round at this time.
release_text: New (4.1.4) * Improve bus networking handling Previous Versions * Improved bus route user interface * Fixed issue where no metro entrances were visible on the map * Improved rail user interface Upcoming * WMATA Bus schedules Known Issues * WMATA service does not provide detail arrival times for terminal stations (e.g., Vienna, etc.) Please review the app's Terms of Agreement & Entrance Service Agreement. Additional features may be requested at our Facebook page.

Using a cutting-edge technology called augmented reality, Pearson’s BouncePages app launches engaging, interactive video animations that bring textbook pages to life. Use your mobile device to snap a picture of the pre-tagged Pearson page, and an animation illustrating the page’s concept launches immediately. No slow websites or hard-to-remember logins required. And, in addition to these dynamic animations, many of the pages also include hands-on practice opportunities for students to directly apply what they just learned. BouncePages’ augmented reality technology transforms textbooks into convenient digital platforms, breathes life into your learning experience, and helps you grasp difficult academic concepts. Textbook learning will never be the same. Features: • Easy To Scan: Every page has been tested to ensure instant recognition and the immediate launch of the accompanying animation. • Engaging, Interactive, and Educational: The animations include friendly characters, entertaining scenarios, and effective explanations of the material. They allow students to go at their own pace and feature interactive math tools that let students practice what they just learned. • Straightforward and Relevant: The animations and practice opportunities use real-world situations to demonstrate the material in a way that students can easily relate to. • Hassle-Free: There’s no need to journey to the computer or create another online account that you’ll probably forget anyway. All you need is your book and your mobile device to launch the animations.
release_text: - Added support for 3D models in Pop Out mode. You can now rotate and zoom in to view models at any angle by swiping or rotating with two fingers.

description: Smart Memory Booster - Android RAM Optimizer to speed up your devices as well as prevent battery drain! Smart Memory Booster reclaims lost memory for your programs by defragmenting your smartphone's memory as well as stop apps that runs on background and drain your battery. It is designed to tackle the difficult yet crucial problem of memory management for all Android devices. There are 5 ways to boost memory ☆ Auto smart boost - boost when device meets certain conditions, such as free memory amount, importance of an app, or how many memory that an app consumes ☆ Floating widget - Enable Memory Booster floating widget (on by default) to one tap boost anywhere ☆ Home screen widget - Add a widget from home screen ☆ Notification - one tap to boost (toggle notification boost bar visibility in app's setting) ☆ Boost Now button - tap this button from app's main screen There are many advanced options to tune boosting process: ☆ Boost level: select among 5 boost levels ☆ Ignored apps: apps will not be stopped when boosting ☆ Report style-define how to show reports ☆ Boost automatically: auto-boost, come with minimal Memory threshold and Boost interval ☆ Feedback - a haptic feedback when touch on boost widget ☆ Floating widget position/size/transparency - Change overlay widget position/size/opaque level ☆ Notification - Show memory info with report/auto refresh settings Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DroidMate

app_name: Hi Guess the Games: App Quiz
description: All the most popular games are gathering here. Start this addictive trivia quiz and try to guess all of games with the help of the logos or characters in the pictures! Challenge now! Hi Guess the Games is from the creator of Hi Guess the Brand, Hi Guess the Food. You'll find tons of funny puzzles based on the most popular and addictive games, including Angry Birds, Where's My Water?, Candy Crush, Fruit Ninja etc. I bet you must have played some of them. But how many of them can you recognize? Hundreds of puzzles are waiting for you to challenge. This is an most addictive quiz for players! Challenge yourself or you can challenge your friends. It is easy to play for any ages. See the icon, the logo, the character or other typical elements in the image and guess the game name. Solve all these puzzles now! Get Stuck? Relax, you can use hints to solve puzzles that you can't figure out or even reach out to your friends using Facebook to ask for help. Or you also can tap the “Reveal Letter” button to show a random correct letter, the “Remove Letters” function will help you to remove the incorrect letters. And if you want to access the next puzzle directly, you can tap the button of “Skip Puzzle”. Besides, if you already run out of the hints, you can get more free ones by sharing it to Facebook. Download it now! Challenge the quiz, solve the puzzles and have endless fun immediately! Features: Simple to play, no ending fun! Free, No Registration required. Super easy to get started. Enjoy the puzzle fun immediately. Continuously add new funny puzzles! Continuous version updates always add new puzzles for you. Never ending fun! You will always feel fresh. Challenging and most addictive quiz! Some of the puzzles you can figure out easily, but some are hard to solve. You can't help challenging those entertaining puzzles. Hints are ready to help you! Don't worry. If you get stuck in a hard puzzle, you can use the hints we provide or you also can share the puzzle to your friends using Facebook to ask for help. Besides, you also can share the game to your friends on Facebook to obtain more free hints.

Hexagons is a funny game played by thousands of players around the world. On the game board you have to add hexagons and find matches of hexagons with the same value. When you tap a neighbor hexagon of the green one, its value will be added to the green value, turning from green to gray and becoming blocked. Play against other players and get high scores thinking carefully your next move to make pairs of gray hexagons and avoid the board get blocked. It can be a little complicated at first but after some attempts you will not be able to stop playing! Besides, Hexagons is free, are you going to miss it?
release_text: Thank you very much for playing Hexagons! This version comes with sounds settings, removes ads in game and adds a share score button at the end of the game.

description: With the SAP HR Approvals mobile app for Android, you can quickly take action on your employees’ requests anywhere and anytime. This app allows managers to evaluate and respond to approval requests right from their Android device, providing employees with quick replies and managers more time to focus on value-added work. Key features of SAP HR Approvals • Respond to leave requests and timesheet entries • Review team calendars and employee time account balances • Check for incomplete timesheets, overbooking, and overlapping leave requests • Receive automatic notifications of new leave requests Note: To use SAP HR Approvals with your business data, you must be a user of the SAP ERP application, with mobile services enabled by your IT department. You can try out the app first using demo data.

Control your DIRECTV satellite receiver over WiFi! Don't settle for anything less than the *original* DIRECTV Remote Control! Quickly view what's on right now on all your favorite channels, and switch between them with ease! Check out the paid version to remove ads and add features! **To use, your DIRECTV receiver must be connected to your network.** **To those wishing for volume control** I'd love to do that too, but volume is a function of your audio equipment (i.e. television set), and the only way to do control such a device is via infrared signals. I don't know of any Android devices which natively support infrared, meaning there would need to be some kind of extra hardware support, not something I'm currently planning on doing. FEATURES ----------- > Signal meter to check the signal quality of the currently tuned channel--especially useful for installing a dish, since you no longer need to have someone else checking the signal meter onscreen. > Reset your receiver directly from the app--if your receiver becomes sluggish, resetting will usually resolve any issues > Full remote control emulation--completely duplicates the physical remote control provided with your receiver. > Automatic detection of receivers, zero configuration > Display what's currently playing and what's on right now on all your favorite channels > Launch the DIRECTV official app directly from the options menu for quick access to DIRECTV's online scheduling utility > Can be used in conjunction with Slingbox to remotely control the receiver while watching remotely SETUP ----------- Setup is simple if you are connected to Wi-Fi. Just press the Menu key and choose "Select Receiver". Your receivers will be automatically detected and displayed in a list. High definition receivers without DVRs (models H21, H23, and H24) will need to be manually added the first time, or whenever the IP address for the receiver changes. High definition receivers with DVRs (models HR20, HR21, HR23, and HR24) should be automatically detected if they are correctly connected to the same home network. If your receivers are not detected, you can manually enter the IP addresses and add them to the list. --FOR ADVANCED USERS ONLY-- If you would like to use over 3G or 4G, you must forward port 8080 to your DIRECTV receiver, and manually add your public IP address as a receiver. For now, only one receiver can be accessed via this method. Requires DIRECTV PLUS HD DVR (models HR20, HR21, HR22, HR23, HR24 and H21, H23, H24) connected to a home network. This app will NOT let you watch your recordings on your android device. That would require reverse-engineering DIRECTV's DRM, and would likely be found to be in violation of the DMCA. I am not affiliated with DIRECTV in any way. This app may stop working at any time at DIRECTV's discretion. See website for full changelog. -- direct tv directtv direc tv

Want to feel what gestures can do? here's an application which will let you turn of your screen just with a swipe!! yes that's right!! All you have to do is swipe your hand over the proximity sensor (Located near the earpiece on top of the phone). Donate: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=FQMVBPXQ6PERN Features: 1) Turn off the screen by sliding your hand 2) Turn off the screen by Covering the sensor for a duration of time (Tap and Hold) 3) Turn on the screen by Covering the sensor for a duration of time (Tap and Hold) - Note: This can cause Battery Drain 4) Enable screen on/off during calls only 5) ScreenOff shortcut, to turn off the screen by launching the app. 6) Based on your device select the sensor of your choice, or the one that's available and configure their values, as they are different for different devices. Motivation to build this app: 1) While the phone is in pocket, and you have your bluetooth headset connected, even though you can answer your call with a click of bluetooth headset button, because the screen goes on and remains on, your call may hang-up or go on hold or probably few buttons may get pressed, isn't that annoying? 2) Lot of android phones don’t turn off the screen when phone is held close ear (You may end up hanging up on someone) 3) Accidental call pickups: Since capacitive screens are sensitive to touch as well as heat, An Incoming call gets picked up automatically when phone is in the pocket (And we get obliged to speak to annoying calls) 4) Its Cool!!! 5) If you are a HD2 user, you would know the pain. Many users have replaced that hardware buttons due to usage!!! NOTE: To un-install, go Settings, Locations & Security, Select Device Administrators and disable the ScreenOff App For Support: Post you questions on http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=9884280# Tested On: 1) HD2, Desire HD, Nexus One, Motorolla Xoom(Light Sensor), DROID Incredible

This is special software for PocketGeiger Type3, to turn your Android device to be a radiation detector, by connecting PocketGeiger with microphone input of Android device. For more information, visit our project website. http://www.radiation-watch.org Sensor: PIN photo diode VBPW34 x 8pcs (reverse biased and shielded) Detectable radiation: Gamma particles Measurement range: 0.05uSv/h~10mSv/h (Calibrated using Cs-137), 0.01cpm~300000cpm Measuring time: about 15 minutes at the dose rate of 0.05uSv/h Energy response: :662keV~1333keV Software features - uSv/h and its counting error calculation - CPM calculation - Manual setting interface for threshold - Oscilloscope *We do not correct any personally identifiable information , such as device ID.
release_text: When the 0% noise threshold no longer makes noise detection process.

In case you are tired of tons of cute apps, you love horror or willing to take part in All Hallows Eve – you got the right app. Rotten Friends will take you and your friends to the world of horror. Morph into a blood-thirsty vampire, a sexy succubus, luring men to their doom, learn Voodoo magic and rise from the dead, become a scar-covered cold-blooded, bloodlusty maniac, give Satan a high five and humiliate him with the size of your horns and wing-spread. description: Features: - Picture and news updates - FullScreen pictures - Pictures available Offline - Pictures and Homemade news Like Do it yourself (DIY) is the method of building, modifying, or repairing something without the aid of experts or professionals. Academic research describes DIY as behaviors where "individuals engage raw and semi-raw materials and component parts to produce, transform, or reconstruct material possessions, including those drawn from the natural environment (e.g., landscaping)". DIY behavior can be triggered by various motivations previously categorized as marketplace motivations (economic benefits, lack of product availability, lack of product quality, need for customization), and identity enhancement (craftsmanship, empowerment, community seeking, uniqueness) The term "do-it-yourself" has been associated with consumers since at least 1912 primarily in the domain of home improvement and maintenance activities. The phrase "do it yourself" had come into common usage (in standard English) by the 1950s, in reference to the emergence of a trend of people undertaking home improvement and various other small craft and construction projects as both a creative-recreational and cost-saving activity.

Caring for a pet pig can be great fun especially when you get to choose your pig! With this pet piggy care caring game for animals you can easily choose and care for your pet piggy while having plenty of fun. With this free caring game you can easily pick from 5 different pigs to call one your very own and help to clean up the room that they have messed up when they were naughty. You can also have fun in washing, rinsing, drying, and blow drying your pet piggy before giving it a full makeover! With this fun caring game you can also clean your pigs teeth for a perfect white piggy smile while filing their hooves, cleaning their ears, brushing their hair, and cutting their nose hair. Once your pet pig is all clean and clipped you can then accessorize by mixing and matching a neckpiece, headpiece, and outfit so they look their best when out and about. So if you love caring kid’s games, then you will just love to play free games with this pet piggy game for girls. Features: • Choose your very own pet pig to love and look after! • Clean and tidy the messy room that your pet piggy messed up when running about! • Scrub, rinse, dry and blow dry your pet piggy so they are nice and clean! • Clean their teeth to make their smile bright and white! • Cut their nose hair, clean their ears, and file their hooves to finish off their makeover! • Accessorize with beautiful neckpieces, outfits, and headpieces to create the best looking pet pig around!

What's Sara's Cooking Class : Welcome to Sara's kitchen: a playful foodie paradise for kids! Learn to bake and cook with over 200 different ingredients and tools and master tasty recipes from around the world! Come play with your food—and discover how delish it is to be the chef! What do they think about the cooking class : ★Wired.com/GeekMom - "The game is a great way for mothers (and fathers) to bond with their children." ★Wired.co.uk - "The whole family has been very impressed so far. With 17 recipes and 183 different ingredients to use I suspect that completing Sara’s Cooking Class will take some time” ★KidzVuz - "Anything that can entertain your kid while you get things done, and then turn around and inspire together time sounds perfect to us." ★The Online Mom - "Sara's Cooking Class is a fun, educational gaming experience for kids and parents." STEP-BY-STEP RECIPES ♥ Make 17 of Sara's most popular recipes, including homemade pizza and red velvet cake ♥ Follow Sara's instructions and handy hints around the kitchen ♥ Chop, mix, boil, fry, prep, and bake ingredients along the way ♥ Learn about lots of ingredients, kitchen tools and flavors ♥ Work your way up to a 3-star recipe rating ♥ Take the fun offline, too—use the recipes in your real-life kitchen! A KITCHEN JUST FOR KIDS ♥ Hours of parent-approved entertainment ♥ Kid-friendly interface designed to build motor coordination, imagination, and curiosity ♥ Sara speaks your language! ♥ No 3rd-party ads SPECIAL DETAILS ♥ Cute, super-polished graphics ♥ Game available in 11 languages: US English, UK English, French, Portuguese, Swedish, Italian, German, Dutch, Latin-American Spanish, Polish, and Russian ♥ FREE UPDATES—stay tuned for more recipes coming soon! Check out Sara's website: http://sarascookingclass.girlsgogames.com/ Like Sara on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/sarascookingclass We ♥ comments. Rate and review us! See you soon little chef

app_name: Tasks To Do Pro, To-Do List
description: A place for your tasks You have important tasks to do you don't want to forget? Then Tasks To Do is the place for them. Tasks To Do is the easy to use, full-featured task list app you need. You can store your tasks, sort and filter them very flexibly, set alerts, manage due dates and times etc. The pro version also syncs with Google Tasks and Toodledo. A trial version is available at http://www.refined-apps.com For questions, remarks, suggestions or feedback mail us at support@refined-apps.com ---- Features ------------ ✓ As many task list views as you like ✓ Current design style, light & dark ✓ Supports phones & tablets (split-screen layout etc.) ✓ Translations to English, German, French, Spanish, Japanese, Polish, Hungarian, Russian, Chinese Task fields ✓ Title ✓ Customizable Categories (for filtering and sorting) ✓ 5 Priority levels ✓ 4 Tasks states (Not started / started / waiting / done) ✓ Due date & time ✓ Repeating tasks ✓ Reminders / Alerts (including sound/vibration settings) ✓ Notes Bidirectional synchronization ✓ with www.toodledo.com (great to sync a phone with a tablet) ✓ with Google Tasks (all lists) Widgets ✓ A widget is available supporting scrolling, resizing, light/dark theme, customization of font size, displayed fields, touch actions, ... ✓ "Icons-Only" widgets to add tasks and sync manually ✓ On Android >= 4.2, the widgets can be used on the lockscreen ✓ Fast task creation from widget ✓ Fast task creation by long-pressing the search button in any app ✓ Support for the Google Now "note to self" command ✓ Supports other calendar apps (e.g. HebDate Hebrew Calendar and OI Calendar Picker) ✓ Quick Search ✓ Voice recognition ✓ Flexible sorting options ✓ Flexible filter options (task state, due date, category, ...) ✓ Can display tasks of multiple categories in a single list (instead of a separate list per category/folder) ✓ Sharing of tasks (e.g. for printing, mailing, ...) ✓ Backup/Restore ✓ No ads ---- Pro vs. Free Version ------------ Tasks To Do Pro includes all the features of Tasks To Do Free plus: ✓ Bidirectional synchronization of all your Google Tasks / gTasks lists ✓ Bidirectional synchronization with Toodledo (www.toodledo.com) . - Great to sync your tasks between your phone and your android tablet . - Tasks in Toodledo can be synced with many other tools (Google Calendar, Outlook, ...). For an overview, see http://www.toodledo.com/tools/directory.php ) ✓ More configuration options for the widgets ✓ Lockscreen widgets (Android >= 4.2) ✓ No ads You can easily transfer your tasks from the free to the pro version via the backup feature. ---- Requested Permissions ------------ For basic functionality: ✓ "android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to write backups on the sd-card ✓ "android.permission.VIBRATE" to be able to vibrate when an alert is triggered ✓ "android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED" to reactivate alerts after booting ✓ "com.android.vending.CHECK_LICENSE" to check the license ✓ "com.als.taskstodo.READ_TASK_DATA" and "com.als.taskstodo.WRITE_TASK_DATA" for protected access to Task To Do's task data For synchronization with www.toodledo.com and Google Tasks: ✓ "android.permission.INTERNET" to exchange data with www.toodledo.com and Google Tasks ✓ "android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" to test if the phone is online ✓ "android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS", "android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS" and "android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS" to create the Toodledo account in android ✓ "android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS" to trigger the manual synchronization ✓ "android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS" to find the Toodledo/Google Tasks accounts for synchronization ✓ "android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS" to access the toodledo/Google Task passwords for synchronization
release_text: 2.6.2 + Bugfixes 2.6 + Bugfixes + Some adjustments for Android 6

description: Prosimo, da pred prenosom aplikacije na strani s pogostimi vprašanji in odgovori, preverite seznam podprtih naprav: http://www.hbogo.si/pages/faq.aspx . Seznam podprtih naprav redno osvežujemo. HBO GO aplikacija je popolnoma kompatibilna izključno z napravami na seznamu. Predstavljamo HBO GO®. Novo širokopasovno storitev videa na zahtevo. HBO GO ponuja več kot 1500 ur najboljših filmov in serij, tudi kultno originalno HBO produkcijo, hit filme, nove serije, nagrajene dokumentarce, koncerte in še mnogo več! Glejte hit filme, najnovejše serije in HBO originalno produkcijo, ki vključuje kultne serije, kontroverzne dokumentarce, koncerte, komedije in številne druge vsebine na svojih mobilnih napravah – kadarkoli, kjerkoli. Storitev HBO GO je trenutno dostopna HBO Premium naročnikom, in sicer pri Telemachu in Siolu. HBO GO® aplikacija vam omogoča da: - najljubše programske vsebine nosite s seboj: glejte najboljše HBO vsebine, ki vključujejo hit filme, nove serije in kultno HBO originalno produkcijo, kjer velja omeniti serije ‘’Prava kri’’, ‘’Igra prestolov’’, ‘’Imperij pregrehe’’, ‘’Uredništvo’’, ‘’Povračilo’’, ‘’Podpredsednica’’, ‘’Punce’’, ‘’Priskledniki’’, ‘’Nikar tako živahno prosim’’ in mnoge druge. Poleg tega boste lahko uživali tudi ob nagrajenih dokumentarcih in številnih drugih dodatnih vsebinah.! - gledate vse sezone kultnih HBO serij kot so “Sopranovi”, “Seks v mestu ”, “Skrivna naveza” in druge. - si najnovejše dele izbranih serij ogledate le en dan po ameriški premieri – kadarkoli, kjerkoli. - ne zamudite niti enega trenutka najljubših serij in filmov – HBO GO lahko spremljate kadarkoli si to zaželite, kjerkoli že ste. - izberete kaj in kdaj želite gledati. Programske vsebine, ki jih nikakor ne želite zamuditi, si enostavno dodate v Moj izbor in si jih ogledate kasneje. Če želite na svojih mobilnih napravah uporabljati aplikacijo HBO GO®, porebujete 3G ali WiFi internetno povezavo. Spremljanje vsebin preko HBO GO aplikacije za mobilne naprave lahko povzroči povečano porabo prenosa podatkov. Za več informacij kontaktirajte svojega operaterja. ©2013 Home Box Office, Inc. Vse pravice pridržane.

description: Aemula is a virtual PC mainly for running DOS programs, playing DOS games, and even install Windows 3.1. This app is started because the author wanted to play his old time favorite CIV2 on ARM powered tablets. To make this dream come true, this emulator is implemented with hand optimized assembler and multi threading emulation to squeeze every bit out of your dual core tablet. Under the humble cover is a beast that can turn your device into a cutting edge PC in the early 90s. • i486 PC emulation, capable of running DOS622/Windows 3.1. • CPU Speed adjustable on the fly. When running at 10MIPS, its speed is comparable to 80486DX 66MHz (As reported by Norton sysinfo). • Floppy disk drive, Harddisk, and CDROM • 8bit Sound blaster 2.0 • VGA / SVGA Cirrus5430 • Emulated Serial Mouse • Emulated Joystick • PC compatible keyboard • Larger configurable keypad for gaming control • Support external bluetooth keyboard NOTE: Unlike DOSBox, Aemula doesn't emulate DOS directly. Instead, it comes with a Freedos boot disk. You can install MSDOS and Windows 3.1 on it. Visit http://www.aemula.net/guide.html for more help information. This emulator is written in ARM assembler language, so it's incompatible with "Intel Inside" devices, at least for now.
release_text: v2.2 - Fix UI issues on phone - Add "Ctrl-Break" key support. Please delete the rombios.bin under /sdcard/aemula, let the app generate a new one for you. v2.1 - UI compatible with HD phones v2.0 - UI Improvement: fullscreen in landscape mode - External keyboard support v1.6 - Add SVGA (Cirrus 5430) emulation Please delete your init.l file and let it regenerate. v1.5.1 - Make keyboard higher. Easier to target. - UI improvement.

description: ** Massive update to Version 2! ** Now the CCSS app includes a variety of tools to help teachers, including a roster, reporting functionality, advanced search, and more, in addition to the reference information. The Common Core State Standards app is both an interactive reference and a sophisticated tool for teachers. It includes a reference for all of the standards in the national Common Core State Standards Initiative for school systems across the country. This easy to use and concise app allows teachers, administrators, and parents to view the standards, take notes on each standard, create a roster of students, take notes on individual students' progress, create and print reports per standard or per student, mark standards with customizable indicators, and easily search the standards. It also includes the ability to download lesson plans and standards materials to aid teachers. Students can even create reports and do homework using templates and turn them in to be read and stored within the CCSS app. It is an excellent reference for teachers to utilize in developing lesson plans, and for parents to understand the standards their children are learning and being tested against. The app includes Common Core State Standards for Math and English from grades Kindergarten through High School. 45 states have adopted the Common Core State Standards, which represents a significant direction in our country’s educational system. The Common Core State Standards app has been developed to help teachers and parents in providing students with a quality education that meets the requirements of the Common Core State Standards. Features: • Easy to use reference interface to access all of the Common Core State Standards • Create a roster of students in a class • Take notes for each standard and each student. Even take notes per student per standard. • Create reports for each student, tracking progress against the standards, and create reports for each standard for use in communicating with the administration. • Includes the Common Core State Standards for Math and English Language Arts in Grades Kindergarten through High School • Organized by grade level for relevant access. Set your preferred grade level. • Powerful search feature that allows search through all of the standards • Add your own progress indicators to each standard • Built on a powerful engine designed to correlate a large amount of content with each standard. Download a variety of documents and data into your own personal library. Common Core State Standards content copyright National Governors Association Center for Best Practices, Council of Chief State School Officers, Washington D.C.
release_text: Large Version 2 update! Added in Rosters, Reporting, Interactive content and a library for your documents, Enhanced Search, Enhanced Notes, and more customization features. V2.1 includes reference materials for each standard.

description: Onkyo’s Remote App supports wireless audio and remote control functionality. Onkyo’s Remote App allows owners to integrate wireless audio stored on an Android device into their Onkyo home network system. The app operates over a wireless LAN and enables a range of remote control functions, such as volume and tone control and input selection. Functions:  • Wirelessly streams music stored on an Android device • Operates general remote-control functions (e.g. play, stop, power on/off)  • Controls multi-zone audio • Selects input source, network source, and radio station  • Adjusts tone control, listening modes, and speaker volume • Displays content information  • Compatible with Spotify Connect • Compatible with Onkyo’s existing RI (Remote Interactive) system *For details on RI-compatible systems, please refer to the Onkyo website. *This application program does not support tablet devices. *This application program does not support smartphones in QVGA or HVGA resolution. Compatible Onkyo Models: • All network A/V receivers released in 2010/11/12/13, TX-8050 Network Stereo Receiver, T-4070 Network Stereo Tuner, and CR-N755*  *All models may require a firmware update available for download at the Onkyo website.

Aces Bubble Popper Pop! Pop! Pop! Enjoy a classic bubble pop game with a twist. Aces Bubble Popper includes three different game modes for tons of bubble popping fun! Attempt to burst all the bubbles in the Classic mode or race the clock to pop the required number of bubbles with the Timed mode. For a truly unique experience try Super Action mode with specials, like bubble swap and bubble gum, to clear bubbles even faster. Become an expert at all three of the mini-games in the Super Action mode to gain even more points and earn a place at the top for the online leaderboards! Game Features: • 3 different game types: Classic, Timed, and Super Action. • Easy, Medium, and Hard difficulties! • Specials to earn extra points and pass levels faster. • Fun and challenging mini-games in Super Action mode. • Additional bubble colors on higher levels. • Online Leaderboards: personal, daily, weekly and overall. • Tracks tons of statistics! Permissions requested and how they are used: • Full Internet Access: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app. • View Network State: This permission is used primarily to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website. • Modify/delete USB storage Contents Modify/delete SD Card Contents: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device. • Read Phone State and Identity: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications. • View Wi-Fi State: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information. • Control Vibrator: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device. • Automatically start at boot: This permission is used for push notifications, users can turn push notifications off in the marketing inbox. More games from Concrete Software: PBA Bowling Challenge Jellyflop! Aces Spades Wordsplosion Aces Gin Rummy Aces Hearts Aces Traffic Pack Aces Jewel Hunt

Carry all the latest international and county cricket scores, ecb.co.uk cricket news, photos and videos with you wherever you go with the ECB Cricket Android application. This app allows you to follow all England matches at home and overseas, every countries' international Test and ODI fixtures, as well as your favourite county side while you are on the move. Personalise the fixtures to get the scores from the matches and competitions you really want to follow. And get push alerts as wickets fall from the matches of your choice. The scoreboard functionality gives you up-to-the-minute scores, plus headline information including the totals of current batsmen, number of overs bowled and the fall of the last wicket. Swipe the screen to reveal full scorecards for all innings played, and any related tweets from the @ECB_cricket official Twitter feed. Now integrated into the News area, the video feeds give you the best of ecb.co.uk/video - with exclusive England interviews, match highlights from home international series, county features and LV= County Championship highlights of every game too. And you can also listen to weekly ECB Cricket Podcasts throughout the summer season. FEATURES - Live scores for England and county games, plus all Tests and ODIs worldwide, on the unique scoreboard interface - Detailed batting and bowling info on scorecards, plus scoring graphs for ODIs and T20 matches - Rotate app horizontally for extra batting and bowling detail on the scorecards - Personalisation: set the teams and competitions you want to follow - Advanced fixture lists of all games and results archives from all matches - Sign up for TwelfthMan for free in the Info tab for priority ticket windows and exclusive offers - Latest England, county, women’s, grassroots and world cricket news from ecb.co.uk - Photo galleries for individual matches and events with the ability to scroll and zoom images - Feed of all the ECB Cricket podcasts - Video feeds: England highlights and exclusive player interviews with all the best content from ecb.co.uk/video - plus LV= County Championship highlights throughout the summer - Push alerts: fall of wickets from the matches you chose to follow - England squads and individual player profiles - Social media integration and email functionality, plus links to ECB's Twitter and Facebook channels - Wallpapers: add some great cricketing photos to your desktop or lock screen - League tables for county competitions - Ticket purchase contacts and links for England and county matches in the Info tab
release_text: Changes made to the App to include: * Brand new design. * New faster data feeds. * Several bug fixes.

description: Are you color blind? Did you know that there are actually three distinct types of color blindness? Unlike other freely available tests which are simple pass-fail screening tests, the EnChroma test uses the principles of color vision science to measure the type and extent of color vision deficiency. This test was created by the EnChroma team to assist in the correct recommendation of color enhancing eyewear products. EnChroma, Inc. is a Berkeley, CA company that makes innovative eyewear products for medical, industrial and lifestyle markets. EnChroma eyewear products are based on an advanced multi-band spectral filtering technology that is computer-optimized for use with specific types of color vision. On completion of the test, the type and extent of color vision deficiency will be reported, along with a recommendation for which EnChroma eyewear products are best optimized for use with your vision. A copy of your result can be sent by email from this app.
release_text: Version 1.0.3 Feb 6 2013 - Fixed a canvas display problem affecting Android 4.1 and later - Improved visual feedback when pressing response buttons - Added test progress indicator to testing screens - Added an "exit" button to main screen to close app completely

Need more than free videos to learn math? YourTeacher's Algebra 2 app is like having a personal math tutor in your pocket. ** “It’s like a private school math classroom, but you are the only student.” John "I just love YourTeacher and the way you explain things. I felt like I was in a classroom instead of just looking at examples." Diane "Thank you for the program. It has shown immediate results. My sophomore daughter is failing Algebra 2 because she doesn't understand it. In three hours of using your lessons, she completed an entire packet of assignments, 4 days worth, and as the student in the class with the worst grade and most amount of incompleted assignments, she was the first to turn in all the work! And she no longer feels like a failure. Also, my 5th grade daughter spent a few hours "having fun" learning pre-algebra lessons and taking the tests... she got 100% on most of them. That is absolutely amazing!" Bryan ****** Need more than videos to learn Algebra 2… YourTeacher’s Algebra 2 app replicates the entire math classroom experience with your own personal math teacher. Our lessons include: -Multiple video example problems (similar to how a teacher starts class at the board by explaining the examples from the textbook) -Interactive practice problems with built-in support (similar to how a teacher assigns practice and walks around the class providing help) -A Challenge Problem (similar to how a teacher assigns a higher level problem which students must work on their own to prove mastery) -Extra problem worksheets (similar to how a teacher assigns additional problems for homework) -Review notes (similar to how a teacher provides summary handouts or refers you to your textbook) ****** Scope and Sequence YourTeacher’s Algebra 2 app covers an entire year of Algebra 2. CHAPTER 1: SIMPLIFYING Addition and Subtraction Multiplication and Division Order of Operations Evaluation Integers Distributive / Like Terms CHAPTER 2: EQUATIONS CHAPTER 3: WORD PROBLEMS CHAPTER 4: INEQUALITIES, ABSOLUTE VALUE, FUNCTIONS, GRAPHING CHAPTER 5: LINEAR EQUATIONS CHAPTER 6: SYSTEMS OF EQUATIONS CHAPTER 7: EXPONENTS & POLYNOMIALS CHAPTER 8: FACTORING CHAPTER 9: RATIONAL EXPRESSIONS & EQUATIONS CHAPTER 10: RADICALS CHAPTER 11: QUADRATICS CHAPTER 12: IMAGINARY AND COMPLEX NUMBERS CHAPTER 13: QUADRATIC EQUATIONS & FUNCTIONS (Wifi or 3G connection required)
release_text: Interface updated to accommodate larger screen resolutions. App updated to run in both portrait and landscape modes. Lesson content has been expanded and includes more video instruction for each lesson. In addition to the video examples each lesson includes interactive practice problems, challenge questions, and worksheets.

This handbook allows you to look up info without having to type, and without storing large databases on your phone. The app uses an online search engine, so make sure you are not charged for the data transfer. This is a FREE FULL VERSION and contains ads.

Dashclock Storage Extension is an extension for the Dashclock Widget that displays information about the device's currently available internal storage. This extension is free to use when used alone but when used simultaneously with other extensions made by this developer, a small one-time purchase is required to unlock them all. This application is entirely open-source. If you'd like to have new features or additional languages/locales please raise an issue ticket at https://github.com/mridang/dashclock-storage or create a patch and send me a pull-request (if you're adventurous enough). This extension requires the requires the Dashclock Widget by Roman Nurik: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock

Knit Knacks helps you keep track of your knitting projects and display the results. Keep notes and pictures of your projects on a step to step basis and share the results with friends using Facebook integration. Includes a row counter to keep track of where you are and a gallery to display photos of all your projects together. Especially good for large projects and knitting groups because you can share the progress without having to take a large project with you.

description: Guide the silver marble through the wooden maze by creating a path using the various shaped tiles while avoiding the obstacles. You’ll need to be quick though, because once the ball starts rolling it doesn’t stop. Sound simple? You’ll also need to contend with ball warps, roll overs, moving turrets, machines, activation switches, sliding doors and multiball as you work through the puzzles. Marble Mania is the latest action puzzle game from the award winning indie game developer. If you enjoy challenging, entertaining and addictive puzzles mixed with frantic action then this brand new and original fresh game concept is for you. Game Features: - Simple and intuitive touch based gameplay. Requires sharp logic, fast thinking and quick fingers to master. - Contend with ball warps, roll overs, moving turrets, machines, activation switches, sliding doors and multiball as you work though the puzzles - A large selection of individually crafted puzzle boards for unlimited fun and challenge. More puzzles will be added in free future updates - Supports the following languages: English, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Greek, Turkish, Romanian, Arabic, Persian, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian and Finnish - Increasing difficulty as you progress through the puzzles - High quality images and animation that look great on High Definition (HD) and retina displays of both tablets and smart phones - Addictive fun with some brainteasers thrown in to keep the mind stimulated and entertained for hours. - Free to download and play a selection of the puzzles with a single in game upgrade to the full version that lets you play all current and future added puzzles. - Great fun for the whole family, adults and children alike. Gender neutral, appeals equally to boys and girls. Marble Mania was inspired by the early physics computer games, pinball machines and traditional 80s arcade slot machines. It combines manic graphical rolling and unrolling ballgame play with cognitive brain teasing puzzles that exercise, challenge, stimulate and sharpen the brain. Addictive electronic board game based fun for the whole family appealing to children of all ages as well as teenagers and adults, that will also challenge and stimulate the brain with brainteasers along the way. We hope you enjoy what we believe is one of the best exclusive new action puzzle games available on the app store today. To see our other multi-platform tablet and smart-phone apps please visit our website at http://espacepublishing.com
release_text: - enabled 15 more game boards for free play - improved navigation within the game

Fishboom is a great game about action, speed and skills! Guide the fish through the various mines laid in the ocean! Fish can be grouped in several formations. The more you play, the more formations will be available and the more difficult the game gets! A simple tap can change the current formation. The number of available formation is displayed on the top right of the screen. A long press accelerates the movement speed. Enjoy the randomly generated ocean backgrounds in pixel art as you immerse yourself in the sound environment of the game. Try to get the highest score and beat your friends! Share your score on Facebook and Twitter!

For Android 2.2(Froyo) / 2.3(Gingerbread) NOT for versions above Android 3.0 (Please use another app) Important! It will work properly only on the Korean version of Galaxy S (SHW-M110S) and the similar Samsung's Galaxy devices (e.g. Korean Galaxy Tab) with the ROM based on Samsung's original ROM. I have been reported that this app DOES NOT WORK on some versions of Galaxy S. This is just a shortcut for Samsung's TouchWiz 3G Setting (TouchWiz 3G Setting Widget). You can turn on or turn off the 3G network with this app. This will be helpful when you do not use Samsung's Launcher (TouchWiz Launcher) but the launcher you use does not support shortcuts for activities or you want to add it to the dock. You can add a shortcut as a status bar notification, also. Tested on: Korean Galaxy S (SHW-M110S), Galaxy K (SHW-M130K), Korean Galaxy Tab (SHW-M180S), Korean Galaxy Ace (SHW-M240S), Korean Galaxy S II HD LTE (SHV-E120L)
