description: Give children a fun way to learn new words with this free educational app by Brainster. It's a flashcards app, a word game, and tests memory too! - Fun flash card app features hundreds of high quality pictures with text and narration. - Recommended for kids, kindergartners, and preschoolers. - This free version gives you access to the first four common word categories. Upgrade later to access all eighteen core lessons. - You have the option of showing either 2 or 4 photo flash cards at a time. The object of the game is to match each word with the correct photographs. - Try to get all answers correct to score a perfect 3 stars in each word category! - Categories include: animals, more animals, fruit, plants, shapes, world landmarks, household, sports, senses and feelings, body, seasons and nature, careers, space, continents and oceans, comparisons, helping at home, and insects and spiders. Children will enjoy seeing fun, real-world pictures and feel the joy of getting the right answer. Repetitive playing is key to improving your child's memory, vocabulary and grammar and this app is a great way to prep for future success in his or her reading skills.

挑战2048 是一款非常有趣，简单但有挑战性的游戏，快来体验一下吧！ 玩法:手指上下或者左右滑动，当两个相同数字碰到一起会合并成一个数字，如果您够厉害，当有一个格子里数字达到2048，您就赢了。来挑战2048吧，看你要多久玩到2048，加油！ 2048 is a very interesting challenge, simple but challenging game, come experience it! How to play: a finger up and down or left and right slide, when the two come together with the same number will be merged into a single number, if you are powerful enough, the grid when there is a figure reached 2048, you win. 2048 to challenge it, to see how long you want to play to 2048, come on!

Fußball ist Begeisterung, ist Hingabe und Emotion. All dies kannst Du hautnah erleben – mit der offiziellen App des Deutschen Fußball-Bundes (DFB) die jetzt in neuem Gewand erstrahlt. Einfach installieren und alle News zu den Nationalmannschaften, den Wettbewerben, Ligen und vielen weiteren Aktivitäten des DFB landen immer blitzschnell auf Deinem Smartphone oder Tablet. Die Fans des deutschen Fußballs sind jetzt noch dichter dran: an den Nationalmannschaften, an den Partien der besten deutschen Ligen, an den verschiedensten Fußball-Veranstaltungen. Ob aktuelle News, Liveticker oder Videobereich – mit der DFB-App bist Du in Text, Bild und Video immer auf dem neusten Stand. Ob Team-Details, aktuelle Magazine oder das spannende Tippspiel – die ganze Welt des Fußballs passt jetzt in Deine Hosentasche. Die DFB-App bietet Dir einen Knaller nach dem anderen. Mit dem riesigen Videobereich entgeht Dir keine DFB-Veranstaltung. Ob Highlight-Berichte der Länderspiele, Zusammenfassungen der Spiele um den DFB-Pokal, das Beste aus der 3. Liga, die Junioren-Bundesliga, die Frauen-Bundesliga oder die sozialen Aktivitäten. Mit dieser App hast Du nicht nur das Gefühl live dabei zu sein – Du bist es tatsächlich. Denn über die DFB-App sind auch die Live-Events des Videokanals DFB-TV verfügbar. Und mit den Videos aus den Quartieren der deutschen Nationalmannschaften wird jedes Länderspiel für Dich zu einer einzigartigen Erfahrung. Per Video ziehst Du mit Manuel Neuer, Mario Götze, Alexandra Popp oder Simone Laudehr ein in die Teamhotels der A- und der Frauen-Nationalmannschaft. Tauche ein in die Welt der Nationalmannschaften, lasse Dich faszinieren von den Emotionen und fühle Dich als Teil der größten Fan-Gemeinde. Die DFB-App ist ein Muss für alle schwarz-rot-goldenen Fußball-Fans. Aktuelle Informationen, exklusive Interviews, interessante Hintergrundberichte und viele, viele Fakten. Hol' Dir die DFB-App, hol' Dir Emotion, Hingabe und Begeisterung auf Dein Smartphone! Football is enthusiasm, is devotion and emotion. All this you can experience at first hand - with the official app of the German Football Association (DFB) which now shines in a new guise. Just install and all news about the national teams, competitions, leagues and many other activities of the DFB always end up at lightning speed on your smartphone or tablet. The fans of German football are now even closer: to the national teams, the games of the best leagues in Germany, to a variety of football events. Whether the latest news, live ticker or video section - with the DFB app are you always up to date Whether team details, current magazines or the exciting betting game in text, image and video -. The whole world of football matches now in your pocket. The DFB app provides you with a bang after another. With the huge video section you will not miss any DFB event. Whether highlight reports of international matches, summaries of the matches of the DFB Cup, the best of the 3. Liga, the Junior League, the Women's Bundesliga or social activities. With this app, you have not only the feeling of being there live - you're actually there. Because on the DFB app also the live events of the video channel DFB-TV are available. And with the videos from the quarters of the German national teams will each international match for you a unique experience. Per video you draw with Manuel Neuer, Mario Götze, Alexandra Popp or Simone Laudehr a. In the team hotel the A and the women's national team Immerse yourself in the world of national teams, be thrilled by the emotion and feel like a part of the largest fan base. The DFB app is a must for all black-red-golden football fans. For the latest information, exclusive interviews, interesting background reports and many, many facts. Grab some the DFB app, Grab some emotion, devotion and enthusiasm on your Smartphone!
release_text: Danke, dass du die offizielle App des DFB nutzt. Wir möchten dir die Verbesserungen mit Version 2.0.5 vorstellen: Ein grober Fehler wurde behoben, der die Applikation zum Absturz gebracht hat.

description: Top Gear Cool Wall App Sponsored by Samsung/Phones 4U And now, it's time for the Cool Wall App... Now you can create your own Cool Walls, and rearrange the show Cool Wall itself. Using over 350 cars, you can place the cars where you think they should be on the Cool Wall and find out if the presenters think you've got it right in an audio sound bite. All the images of the cars are complete with stats. Be warned though, the car stats are highly suitable as slightly dodgy pub facts, but use sparingly when you need to win an argument. Where there was more than one model, we simply picked our favourite. For the most accurate stats, the car reviews section of www.topgear.com/uk/car-reviews is still the place to go.
release_text: Top Gear Cool Wall App Sponsored by Samsung/Phones 4U

description: The #1 FreeCell Solitaire game on the iPhone is now available for Android. FreeCell Solitaire is one of the most popular card games included with Windows, and is now available for free for your Android device! Play solitaire games that require skill, strategy and patience to win! A true brain training experience! FreeCell Solitaire adds a new element of strategy to the classic solitaire games Klondike. After dealing from a standard deck of 52 cards, use the four free cell spots as placeholders as you try to move all of the cards from the Foundation stacks for a win. Just like Klondike solitaire games, you must move cards from the Tableau to the Foundation cells by suit, in ascending order. Most FreeCell games can be solved, if you can find the right strategy. You've played FreeCell solitaire on your computer, and now you can play FreeCell free, anywhere at any time of the day! You won’t want to play any other FreeCell solitaire game again! FREECELL SOLITAIRE FEATURES: - NEW Highlight Movable Cards - NEW Step-by-step tutorial - Random games - 1 million well known games - Portrait - Landscape - Game state saved when interrupted - Unlimited undo - Hints - Auto complete to finish game - Statistics - Tap to move or drag and drop - Tablet support - Install to SD card supported - App2SD Solitaire Games Free - FreeCell Solitaire is free, just like on Windows computers! - Klondike solitaire or other solitaire game fans will love FreeCell! - Solitaire games can be random or one of one million well known games. Brain Games with Solitaire - FreeCell Solitaire can be for beginners or those looking for an addicting brain teaser! - FreeCell instructions included in the app. Brain Games – If you enjoy brain teasers, you’ll love FreeCell Solitaire! - Brain training with FreeCell Solitaire! Track your stats in the app and share them with others on Facebook! FreeCell solitaire has never been more fun! With two unique control schemes, randomized FreeCell card decks, in-depth stat tracking, and social sharing features, FreeCell Free is one of the fun addicting games you’ve been waiting for. New solitaire players will be addicted to FreeCell Solitaire. If you loved strategy games like Sudoku or casino card games, you’ll love the FreeCell challenge. Put your card playing and strategy skills to the test and download FreeCell Free today! For FreeCell Solitaire support: http://www.mobilityware.com/support.php FOLLOW US on Twitter @mobilityware LIKE US on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/mobilityware
release_text: We’ve included another update to give you the highest quality experience with FreeCell. If you’re enjoying the game, please take a few seconds to give us a review. This update includes: • Highlight Movable Cards: Turn on this feature in the settings menu to highlight the cards available for your next move. • Interactive Tutorial: Learn how to play FreeCell with our new step-by-step tutorial!

description: InstaCalendar puts a new spin on Instagram with Calendar view. Remember every day in beautiful detail - You can browse your instagram images with beautiful monthly view which allows your to see your history at a glance - Creates collage of most popular photos every month into Instagram that can be shared with friends - After month view has been created you can share it with your friends. - [Full] choose from your existing gallery photo just click on empty day - [Full] you can choose from existed photo on your Instagram account within a day just click on day with small orange dot (if exists there are several photo ) - No annoing adds - See your photo of the day every single day. - Scheduled reminder reminds every month about completion your instacalendar - Login/logout using settings to play with different instagram accounts
release_text: - History notification should works every day - Added ability to choose number of shown popular images in popular tab

description: Drivers Ed California is brought to you free of charge by DriversEd.com!! _________________________________________ Need a license in California? Study anytime, any place with Drivers Ed California for any Android device. FREE from DriversEd.com, the leader in online drivers education, this full-featured study companion can quiz you from a database of more than 350 MVD questions. Your results are recorded so you can track your progress and review your incorrect answers. Retake past tests as many times as you want to make sure you know the material. Pick the length of each test—take a test of 5 questions or as many as 100. It’s your choice! Use the Flash Card feature to quickly study the important facts you need to know for the test. Of course, you’ll still need to read the California Driver's Manual to prepare for the permit test. With Drivers Ed California, you can download the CA Driver's Manual to your device anytime! After the first download, the manual is saved on your device so you don’t have to wait for the download again. The CA manual is an official DMV publication in PDF format. The text is crystal clear (pinch to zoom, just like a web page). This app works with DriversEd.com’s California drivers education course, which you can take to get your drivers license! DriversEd.com is approved by Road Safety Educators' Association & The Driving School Association of the Americas. Features: + Over 350 questions + Each Quiz pulls random questions, giving you a different quiz each time + Select the number of questions you want in each quiz + Results for each quiz are saved for your review and study. Tests can be retaken. + Download California’s Drivers Manual so you can read and study any time + Study with flash cards

★★★ Geo Quiz Game ★★★ Know all the world flags, capitals and places? Think so? Guess the country then! It's a geography game for all those geography quiz, trivia, brain and puzzle fans, interested people, casual players, kids, adults, students and teachers. Geo Quiz Game - It's a casual trivia game where you can learn, travel through beautiful places, test your knowledge and have fun, either alone or with your friends. Several game modes: ★ Online Challenges Mode (NEW) ★ Flags Quiz ★ Capitals Quiz ★ Photography Quiz ★ Extreme errorless mode Try to guess all the countries in the world: all the flags and all their capitals. If you really want to learn geography, guess places with the most amazing pictures of monuments and landscape with more than 100 photos! You even have the possibility to navigate throughout photos with wikipedia descriptions. You get more points the faster you answer. Try to unlock all the achievements, hidden or not, and compare them with your friends! How to play Geo Quiz Game? 1. Choose the game mode. 2. Guess the right answers within 4 possibilities. 3. The faster you are, more points you'll get. 4. Guess the country! Compete and compare your scores and unlocked achievements with your friends. Try to be the best! Much, much more to come! Tags: Geo, Geography, Quiz, Trivia, Casual, Game, Flag, Capital, Photo, Photography, Puzzle, Brain.
release_text: Version 1.5: ★ Fixed OOM and Bitmap efficiency

description: The CPR Rhythm tool shows the rhythm of the chest compression and breathing in CPR (Cardio Pulmonary Resuscitation) with a sound and animation. It is useful as a supplementary tool in the CPR educational area. < Function of CPR simulation > It shows the compression rate with playing a sound 100(or 110,120)/min and animation. You can start and Stop the chest compression rhythm by the shake gesture. Please select a favorite animation from 4 patterns. You can do the simulation by following settings; *Simulation of CPR with C-A-B. - You can select a compression-to-ventilation ratio, 30:2 or 15:2. - It shows a interruption time with a picture that prompts to start breathing when you need a breathing. Then it sounds every 1 second and automatically restarts a chest compression after 10 seconds. *Simulation of Hands-only CPR *Compression - ventilation time recording - You can record to compression and ventilation time. And save to SD card. < Function of Timer > Count-down Timer : if you want to lesson CPR at a given time. Count-up Timer : if you want to check a elapsed time by CPR. Opt. Alarm at a set time - you may use it for medication support at the situation of ACLS.
release_text: 1.1 CPR skill summary page update 1.2 CPR skill summary page update 1.3 respiration progress bar (1second)

description: HD Wallpapers and Background is the only one application you need to fully customize your device. You can choose the best Android wallpapers and backgrounds from a huge gallery of cool pictures. There are 30 categories to choose from. Application is free and it's awesome, because you can browse the best high quality pictures and have fresh wallpapers every day! Plus we have live wallpapers and widgets that you can configure as you wish. We add new high quality wallpapers and backgrounds every day. A huge community of users rates them anonymously to bring the best for you. You can like them and share with your friends. Application is optimized for latest Android vesrions and uses all its new features. Try out new Daydream option and Widgets with our app. All pictures are HD and human-moderated, wallpapers collection is free. Features: ✔ Browse HD wallpapers and backgrounds filtered by 30 categories. ✔ Like photos anonymously and be a part of huge community of people whos votes can change everything. ✔ Share liked photos with your friends via twitter, facebook, g+ or any other service that you use. ✔ Set up fully customizeable and resizeable Widgets on your Home screen. ✔ You can put any liked picture on Wallpaper (background) or Save it. ✔ LiveWallpaper, see how cool images flow at your home screen. ✔ With Android DayDream feature you can enjoy beautiful free high resolution wallpapers while your smartphone is idle or charging. ✔ Officially supports Google TV and Android TV devices too!!! ✔ If you see a link like: http://wallpapers-backgrounds.com/img/1338 you can click in any other app or browser and our app will open it with appropriate wallpaper for downloading, rating, sharing etc. ✔ NFC and Android Beam - Open wallpaper that you want to share and just touch your friends smartphone and it will open on their side. ✔ Integration with "Muzei" android app ✔ Material design and animations. ✔ NEW!!! Search for what you want exactly. ✔ NEW!!! Crop, resize wallpaper, to get exactly what you want. ✔ NEW!!! Android wear watch face. Set your favorite wallpapers directly on your watch face and refresh automatically. All wallpapers are divided into categories, you can see the most popular, newest and random wallpapers. New wallpapers (images) are added almost every day, so check back every day, you won't be disappointed! HD Wallpapers and Background is one of the brightest and most beautiful applications in Google Play: Personalization, Live Wallpapers categories We have these wallpapers from this 28 categories: Abstract, Android, Animals, Anime, Aviation, Cars, City, Fantasy, Dark, Flowers, Food, Games, Hot Girls, Holidays, Love, Macro, Minimalism, Movies, Moto, Nature, People, Sky, Space, Sport, Tech, Water, Celebrities, Pattern and others Any feedback welcomed , thank you very much for your support. Please rate 5 stars if you like it!
release_text: 3.9 - New feature Android wear watch face. - You can now set your favorite wallpapers directly to your Android wear device on your wrist with new watch face, and they will be updated periodically. 3.8 - New feature to Crop, Resize wallpaper, to get exactly what you want. - UI updates. 3.7: - Added Search. - We redesigned application navigation so it's now easier for you to find best wallpapers with Daily/Weekly/Monthly/All time popular sections and new categories section. - Added Preferences.

description: ‘Broken Sword 2 - the Smoking Mirror: Remastered’ sees the return of George Stobbart and Nico Collard in the sequel to the smash hit ‘Broken Sword: Director’s Cut’, widely praised as the best adventure available for Android. While investigating a ruthless drug gang, journalist Nico Collard unexpectedly comes across an ancient artefact. Little can she know that the ornately carved obsidian stone will lead her, and her adventuring companion George Stobbart, into a mysterious escapade of intrigue and deceit, in which they must overcome powerful forces and antagonists who will stop at nothing to fulfil their evil ambitions. ‘Broken Sword 2 - The Smoking Mirror: Remastered’ is a stunning update to the million-selling original. Along with an exclusive new interactive digital comic, from ‘Watchmen’ co-creator Dave Gibbons, the game boasts fully animated facial expressions, enhanced graphics throughout, high quality music as well as a context-sensitive hint system, and diary. The game also features Dropbox integration which facilitates a unique cross-platform save-game feature, enabling players to enjoy the same adventure simultaneously on multiple devices and many other enhancements. Includes full English speech with optional subtitles in English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Russian or Brazilian Portuguese. Additional speech files can be added to any version for mix and match language support.

L'app "FLIP TM.16" rappresenta un'estensione del sistema FLIP, offrendo all'utente la possibilità di sfruttare la convergenza fisso-mobile e di usufruire, tramite smartphone, di tutti i servizi offerti dalla centrale. •Numero telefonico unico per telefono fisso e mobile. •Inoltro automatico al tuo smartphone delle chiamate dirette al tuo interno. •Chiamate uscenti con lo stesso identificativo (CLI) configurato nella centrale FLIP. •Chiamate uscenti utilizzando la rubrica del cellulare o quella del sistema FLIP. •Visualizzazione dello stato degli interni in tempo reale. •Indicazione dello stato di "occupato" sullo smartphone agli altri interni del sistema. •Registro delle chiamate: perse, ricevute ed effettuate. •Ascolto e gestione dei messaggi vocali. •Inoltro delle chiamate sulla rete IP, sulla rete GSM, sulla rete GSM quando sei fuori ufficio e sulla rete WiFi. •Commutazione automatica da VoIP a GSM e viceversa durante una chiamata. L'app "FLIP.TM16" sfrutta la tecnologia VoIP tramite connessione alle reti WiFi e 3G. Si tenga presente che i gestori GSM possono limitare l'utilizzo del VoIP o applicare delle tariffe aggiuntive. Se avete dei dubbi sull'utilizzo dell'app "FLIP.TM16" con connessione alla rete 3G, utilizzate l'app tramite connessione WiFi. Requisiti •L'utilizzo dell'app richiede una licenza aggiuntiva. •Impostare l'indirizzo IP del sistema FLIP all'interno dell'app, insieme al "Nome Registratione IP" ed alla "Password Registratione IP". •Configurare il "Port Forwarding" sul modem/router che collega il sistema FLIP alla rete Internet. The app "FLIP TM.16" FLIP is an extension of the system, providing the user with the ability to leverage the convergence of fixed-mobile and access via smartphone, all the services offered by the center. • Telephone number only for fixed and mobile phone. • Automatic to your smartphone direct calls to your extension. • Outgoing calls with the same identifier (CLI) set up in the central FLIP. • Outgoing calls using the mobile phone book or the FLIP system. • Display the status of extensions in real time. • Indication of "busy" on your smartphone to other extensions in the system. • Call Log: missed, received and dialed calls. • Listening to and managing voice messages. • Call forwarding on the IP network, the GSM network, the GSM network when you're out of the office and on the WiFi network. • Automatic changeover from VoIP to GSM and vice versa during a call. The app "FLIP.TM16" uses VoIP technology by connecting to WiFi networks and 3G networks. Please note that GSM operators may restrict the use of VoIP or apply additional charges. If you have any doubts about using the app "FLIP.TM16" with connection to the 3G network, use the app via a WiFi connection. Requirements • The use of the app requires an additional license. • Set the IP address of the system FLIP within the app, along with the "Name Registration at IP" and the "Password REGISTRATION IP". • Set the "Port Forwarding" on the modem / router that connects the system to the Internet FLIP.

description: JaredCo delivers again with Screen Grabber – the totally flexible screen capture app that lets you share your screen shots with anyone. Simple. Easy. Useful. ** If you have never taken a screen shot with the hardware buttons for your device you may want to do a Google search to learn how. Some Android devices use different button combinations than others. ** Send SMS Permission is needed to allow you to send the screenshot to a friend by SMS. The app will never send an SMS without you ** And FREE. _______________________________ INSTRUCTIONS : Take a screenshot on the Galaxy S4, S3, or Note 2 using a hand swipe: 1. Open Settings > Motion. 2. Scroll down and find Hand Motion, then Palm Swipe to Capture, and tick the box. 3. Close the menu and shape your hand like you are “chopping” the screen, set your hand on either side of the screen, then horizontally swipe across it – it doesn’t matter which way. If you’ve done it correctly, you should hear the camera shutter and receive a notification that a picture has been saved to the gallery. Another way to take a screenshot on the Galaxy S4, S3 or Note: 1. Pressing the Power and Home buttons at the same time will also grab an image of the screen. This can be awkward to get right, so it’s important to remember to press both buttons at the same time, and hold them until the shutter sound is heard. Both these methods also work on the Samsung Galaxy Notes as well, and the second method is also applicable to the Galaxy S2. Take a screenshot on other Android 4.0, 4.1, or 4.2 devices: 1. Press the Power button and Volume down key at the same time. Remember to hold them until you hear a click or see a screenshot sound. This works on the Samsung Galaxy Nexus and the Google Nexus 7 tablet and should be the first method you try on an Android device. Remember to hold both keys down at precisely the same time, and hold until the shutter clicks. _______________________________ With Screen Grabber, send a map or directions to your best friend with a couple of clicks. There’s nothing quite like Screen Grabber and free is always good. Real good. • With a single click take a screen shot of your Android screen. Tap. Done. • Email that screen shot to anyone, anywhere, any time. JaredCo makes sharing simple. • Screen Grabber stores all your screen captures in a new picture file called Screen Grabs. Want to see you contacts list from a month ago? Easy if you grabbed a screen shot of that important client’s phone number. It’s in the file labeled Screen Grabs, right where we put it for you. • Want to send a map or directions to your technically-impaired friends? It doesn’t get any easier than click and send with Screen Grabber. • So simple to synch, Screen Grabber does it all for you. Download and you’re good to go. Pictures, app icons, maps, tools, contacts, addresses – no matter what’s showing up on your screen, Screen Grabber stores it in one place so you don’t have to fumble for what you need now. And best of all, Screen Grabber is totally free so it costs you zip. But, like all JaredCo apps, it delivers real functionality that enhances your Android experience. You’ve got nothing to lose and lots of utility to gain. Like all JaredCo apps, we design them, we build them and we support them. Even the FREE ones.

Turn your Android phone into a digital magnifying glass with built-in flashlight. Also, you can use these gestures anywhere on the screen: - Double-tap: Zoom out/in - Single-tap: Focus - Long-press: Turn light on/off

The compass application is the most easy, intuitive, usefull and simple to use. It allows you to convert your phone/tablet into a handy compass using device sensors. Compass application can be used in your daily outdoor activities. If you are a scout or you are just going to travel or camping, this is the application that should be on your phone/tablet and should be used everytime you need a compass. Features: -Simple and clean interface. - True North (Default) or Magnetic North. - Various Themes. - Update Speed. - GPS Location (address, latitude, longitude). Calibration: Move away from any source of interference, or re-calibrate by Hold the phone with the display facing up and execute a figure 8 motion. Note: The compass application depends on the device sensors to display compass/location exactly position. If it works perfectly in your device, this means your sensors are perfect. If it's not perfect then might be because of your device sensors of because you need to calibrate.

description: This app help kids practice in a fun and rewarding way. They will look forward to practice and you will watch them learn new things. Synonyms – Antonyms and Sight words will help increase the vocabulary of child. Spellings activity is also included to complete language skills. Activities include applying concept of addition and subtraction and apply multiple number concepts at a time. 1.Missing Numbers – Find the missing numbers. Like 10-?=4 4+?=6 2.Balance the Apples – Child can calculate using fingers 6+5=11. But ask in a different manner – Which two numbers make 11. Here the child will solve problems like these. 3.Even Odd Numbers – This activity helps the child in applying more than one concept. The child has to find even/odd numbers greater than or less than a given number. Finding only even / odd numbers or greater than/less than numbers may not be a challenge but when asked together it becomes. 4.Combinations of Tens ( 10,20,30,40…)- Activity to make the child comfortable with these numbers. 5.Times tables – Child can practise tables from 1-12. and many more

description: Добавлены новые вопросы! Теперь в игре 2550 вопросов! Добавлена возможность выбора ведущего - просто нажмите по изображению ведущего в главном меню. Правила игры: Вы начинаете игру с 10 миллионами в 40 пачках по 250 000 рублей в каждой. Ваша задача удержать как можно больше денег из стартовой суммы после ответа на 8 предложенных вопросов. Для ответа на вопрос, Вам дается 1 минута, во время которой Вы должны поставить всю сумму денег на один или несколько вариантов ответа(люков). Распределяйте деньги в каких угодно пропорциях, используя ползунок. При этом один люк должен всегда оставаться свободным. Ответите неверно - потеряете те деньги, которые поставили на неверный ответ. Игра содержит 2550 вопросов. Мы в Google+: https://plus.google.com/100012048810192416023 Added new questions! Now in 2550 questions the game! Added ability to select the lead - just click on the image leading to the main menu. Rules of the game: You start the game with 10 million in 40 packs of 250 000 rubles each. Your task is to keep as much money out of the starting amount after answering eight questions proposed. To answer the question, you are given 1 minute, during which you have to put all the money into one or several answers (manholes). Distribute money in any desired proportions, using the slider. This one hatch should always remain free. Wrong answer - lose the money delivered to the wrong answer.   The game contains 2550 questions.   We Google+: https://plus.google.com/100012048810192416023

description: Gymnastic Clock is the most creative and artistic app which shows you the time and also functions as a stopwatch and a timer. The digits in the Gymnastic Clock are modeled using a beautiful and flexible blonde model which transitions between each digit while preforming acrobatic stunts. While in timer mode, the stunts will be performed in reverse, and in stopwatch mode, all of the stunts will preformed in one seconds by the digits which represents the milliseconds. The Gymnastic Clock prevents your device from going automatically to stand-by mode so you can put it aside in the background and enjoy it as your pass by. It's a great decoration that you and your friends can enjoy. • Display the time using the flexible and attractive blonde model • a stopwatch with extra fast milliseconds display • a timer with reverse acrobatics • change the color of the model • change the background color You can also change the model and the background colors ! Get it now, it's entertaining :)

From team Cytus, a world acclaimed music rhythm game. Rayark brings you Deemo, a hybrid of music rhythm game and the story of urban fantasy, with hand-drawn art, story-telling gallery and real instrumental feedback of piano key sound. Deemo is a mystic character lives in solitude, a castle, all by itself. A little girl falls from the sky, not knowing who she is, where she comes from. To help the little girl back to her world, Deemo comes to realize a tree keeps growing tall on top of the piano whenever it plays. What would Deemo do when it gets comfortable with the companionship it never had before? What if the little girl couldn't deal with the truth when her seemingly lost memories regained?! "Never left without saying goodbye". Features： -40 Free songs in story mode - More than 110 songs in various music genres, many of which from famous composers -Simple and intuitive gameplay -Twitter and Facebook score sharing function *The Free version has limited story progress, unlock the Full version to enjoy the full experience of Deemo.
release_text: Deemo 2.2 -Newly added: Free song pack "Shattered Memories" with 4 free songs in it (Unlocks after the end of the story) -Newly added: Rabpit Collection/ AD:PIANO Collection for purchasing -Optimize game performance and fix minor issues

description: Shopping list that improves the quality of your grocery shopping by making it easier, faster, and most importantly smarter. It is all you would want out of a grocery list and more. Besides making your shopping a breeze, Listonic provides a wide range of savvy food hacks, smart shopping tips, and overall grocery wizardry, to help you become a smarter shopper and a more conscious consumer. To make sure that Listonic saves you time and money, we focused on speed, simplicity and a user-friendly practical interface. WHY USE LISTONIC - Easy to use - about 70% of products on your shopping lists are reouccuring items. That’s why Listonic now suggests your favourite products first. You’re also able to add quantities with one simple tap and of course if you prefer you can choose the voice input option. - Smart shopping and food tips – Listonic provides hundreds of useful tips and hacks on buying, preserving, and cooking to help you make the most of your groceries. - Your shopping lists are always with you - on your phone or on the web. You can access Listonic through your web browser at http://listonic.com , then create or edit a grocery list on your computer and have it ready to go on your mobile! - Sharing lists with others - it makes shopping with family and friends much easier. Your lists are synced, so any changes are instantaneously seen by others. - Smart sorting - the products on your lists can be sorted automatically according to store aisles to make your shopping easier and faster. - Control your spending - add prices to the items on your shopping list and Listonic automatically calculates your total. People all over the world are already enjoying the convenience of Listonic – with over 2 300 000 products added to lists each month .

This eye test is designed to monitor refractive errors in person's eyes in the most pleasant, intuitive and stress-free way for FREE. Vision test is useful for: - Patients with blurred or distorted vision at all distances - Patients that have eye strains or chronic headaches or fatigue - House visits - Household tests for adults who have doubts if a doctor's visit is required - Household tests for children Features: - Random test charts to eliminate boring and repeating experiences; - Voice controls to help you navigate easier; - Smooth and intuitive interface with animations. Description: Astigmatism is usually caused by an irregularly shaped cornea. More often it comes with birth. Astigmatism may rarely be caused by chronic vigorous eye rubbing (e.g. the cases with children with allergic conjunctivitis) or by cornea diseases such as keratoconus. This eye examination is of particular interest for parents. It is important to reveal problems in children's eyes as soon as possible. If your child is born with astigmatism, the child may not realise there is anything wrong with his/her vision. If child's vision is not regularly tested, visual problems like astigmatism could be undiagnosed for many years, which can cause a lazy eye (amblyopia). What's more, if a child has uncorrected astigmatism, difficulties with reading and concentration at school may arise. In case of not correcting astigmatism the child is most likely to have symptoms like headaches, fatigue or eye strain. It is recommended to pass this test regularly. The Astigmatism Test is made with the best of intentions. The intuitive and flawless design allows you to navigate easily through the application. The voice guidance is provided during the test so that you don't need to move your mobile device near or far to read the instructions but instead you can hear the nice voice guiding you through different steps and actions. The voice can easily be muted and unmuted. In the test, you will be given objects. One should identify if there are blurry parts in different directions. At the end of the test results will show whether the person has astigmatism or not for each eye separately. More details about astigmatism, eye examination tests and trainings as well as other eye related topics can be found in our news.eyeexamtest.com blog. The Astigmatism Test is continuously under improvement so your feedback is appreciated! Tips: - Take the most comfortable position to relax. - Have a mild nature light and no glare on the phone screen. - Place your phone approx. 50 cm/20 inches from your eyes. - Cover one eye at a time with your hand. - Stare at the center of the screen. Do not let your eye drift. - Try to identify if any of the lines appear blurry. Supported Languages: - English - Russian SEE ALSO: We highly recommend using our Eye Care Plus that allows to pass a more detailed eye examination as well as train your eye muscles for better vision. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eyeexamtest.eyecareplus DISCLAIMER: This application is not intended to replace optician's regular full examination. We recommend you get a full eye test after using it.

Fitness Tools combines a number of calculators relating to fitness: Body Adiposity Index (BAI) Body Fat Percentage (BFP) Body Mass Index (BMI) Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) Resting Metabolic Rate (RMR) Waist-Hip Ratio (WHR) The calculators can be used individually or the user can enter all their details in one screen and run all the calculations in one go. User details can be saved for later use. For more help and information press the menu button while running the app. This app is completely free. Questions, comments and suggestions on how to extend or improve this app can be sent to support@circlecubed.com .

description: *** IF YOU LIKE THIS APP, PLEASE LEAVE A RATING. THANK YOU! *** This app lets you see and reply to your SMS threads from your internet browser. The technologies used are: - Simple communication library (for HTTP/S) - CSS (partial bootstrap css, plus own work) - Minified.js (only for the conversation page) - Other JS code (own work, to send messages or update the conversation without refreshing the page) - emoji-java library - apache commons-lang library Receiving and sending is done via GET and POST requests. This app has been built with efficiency in mind. All pages but the conversation one are under 2kb, while conversation is under 20kb (including css and scripts). The update polling requires 1kb every 10 seconds. You will probably not find any sms to http app faster than this. This app is perfectly compatible with my messaging bridge, so if you own it, you can use it to respond to whatsapp and kik too. This app requires both your server and your client to be on the same network.

brain exercise app to quick exercise to your brain short term memory, concentration, focus , speed & accuracy. it has 5 type of brain exercise games. 1. Multitasking brain exercise. 2. Quick Search brain exercise. 3. Math brain exercise. 4 . Focus brain exercise. 5. Colors Vs Brain 1) Multitasking skill: - Increase your brain multitasking capability by playing this.Questions will be displayed at a time in 2 panels. You have to get target score to finish the level by managing not to loose 3 chances on any panel and with in 1 minute.. Try to get max score on each level.. 2) Quick Search skill : Increase your brain searching skills by playing this.Blast the balls from high number to low number with in time limit. 5 seconds penalty on each wrong click. 3) Math Skill : Add,subtract,multiply numbers fast in balloon solver. The objective of the game is to pop the balloons with correct answer. 4) Focus Skill: Increase your focus by controlling your attention. Number will be displayed with rapid pace. Tap the screen after every number except do not tap on withhold number. 5) Color Vs Brain Color List will be displayed for few seconds and colors will be be shuffled, remember the colors by putting full concentration before shuffle and arrange them in same order by dragging the items If you are not satisfied with your results, Play this game daily 5-10 min. You may see better results.

description: There are a lot of unwell patients in the hospital as always. Are they injured? Or are they sick? Let's find out what the cause of a fault is with examination equipments! ==================== How to Play ==================== At first, check an interview sheet! ・Sleeping well? ・Eating healthy? ・Brushed your teeth? etc. Check patient's everyday life. Take patient's temperature and let's start an examination! Germs do bad things and patients get thorns. Treat patients until they feel a hundred percent better! When you examnine all patients in the waiting room, today's work is done. Again tomorrow! With the free version, you can examine patients' eyes, fingers, mouths, and stomachs with a magnifying glass. With the paid version, you can also use doctor's basic equipments such as a stethoscope and X-rays. In addition, four patients including a girl are added, and you can enjoy their facial expressions and reactions even more! ==================== Content ==================== Plenty of content and enjoyable even without paying! -Examination equipments ・Interview sheet ・Magnifying glass (see inside the body, etc.) ・Stethoscope (paid) ・X-ray (paid) -Treatment measures ・Give medicine ・Ice treatment ・Put eyedrops ・Brush his/her teeth ・Put some ointment ・Apply a bandage ・Apply an adhesive bandage etc. -Music Kousuke Matsunobu (saxophone player, composer) http://soundcloud.com/privatemountainorchestra ==================== Supervior ==================== Dr. Kazuhiko Kabe Director of the Newborn Medicine department at Aiiku Hospital Worked for the pediatrics department at Tokyo Saiseikai Central Hospital, the pediatrics department at Tokyo Women's Medical University Hospital, etc. and works for the current hospital since 1996. Mainly devoting himself to healing babies with some sort of illness.

developer: Media Applications Technologies for the BBC
description: Wherever you are, and whatever your plans, you’re always prepared with the latest weather forecast from BBC Weather. FEATURES: • Simple and clear design for easy access to our most detailed and up-to-date information • Search for locations (automatically added to your favourites), or use your current location • See any Met Office severe weather warnings issued at your location • Hourly forecasts with detailed information for the next 48 hrs (UK) • Look further ahead with 3 hourly forecasts (UK and International) • See most likely high and low temperatures, and temperature ranges, for days 6-10 • Tap each hour for extra detail including Pressure, Visibility and Humidity • A day overview including Sunrise/Sunset times, UV, with Pollen and Pollution information for the UK • Swipe vertically to view all your favourite locations • Portrait and landscape modes • Support for 7" and 10" tablets, including hourly temperature curve in landscape mode • A variety of differently sized interactive home screen widgets, and in Android 4.2 a lock screen widget (widgets unavailable if app is moved to SD card) • Share the weather forecast on Facebook, Twitter, email and more • Share favourite locations with a friend via NFC • Override the detected location, and select a nearby location instead • Accessibility for users of TalkBack text to speech • Designed and optimised for Android, and conforms to current Android design guidelines Note: • Ability to store the app on the SD card. Widgets will not be available if you choose to use this function. This is a feature of the Android system. If you cannot see any widgets in your list of available widgets, in settings - manage applications, move BBC Weather from SD card to phone/tablet, and then restart your device. • This app is currently not available for users in the Channel Islands and Isle of Man. The BBC and Google are working to resolve this issue. If you choose to enable the display of weather at your current location [menu/show current location], the app will provide you with weather information based upon your current location. Your precise location is kept on your device, and once the app has determined the location of the closest populated location for which weather information is available, your precise location is not accessed by the BBC. No other personal data relating to you (such as a username, email address or unique device identifier) is sent to the BBC - you can be assured of this, since the app does not request the "read phone status and identity" or "use accounts on the device" permissions. Your information is anonymous, nevertheless the BBC will keep your information secure and not share it with anyone in accordance with the BBC’s Privacy and Cookies Policy, available at http://www.bbc.co.uk/privacy . You can choose to disable the display of weather at your current location [menu/show current location], and then the app will no longer automatically detect your current location.
release_text: Major bug fixes for some known issues around updating weather data, retention of favourite locations and the widget. We appreciate some users have been experiencing the issues mentioned above and we hope this finally solves them. Thanks for bearing with us. We'll continue tackling any issues raised in further updates.

description: Break Bricks is #1 highly anticipated arcade game filled with endless charm and brilliantly designed levels. With new power-ups smartly layered onto the classic gameplay, Break Bricks is more challenging and engaging. Familiar to play, yet hard to master, Break Bricks brings fresh challenges and unanticipated obstacles to breakout hunter age players around the world. In this entrancing game of skill and spatial awareness, it is your job to destroy all the bricks. By using the walls and the paddle below, try your best to ricochet the ball against the bricks and knock down them to extinction. Watch out the challenging bosses (temple shape, dino shape & etc.) every 30 levels. Game Features: - Two set of console quality graphics (classic shores & deadly metal) - Intuitive touch controls with realistic physics - Arcade mode & Endless mode (don't run out of time) - 150+ challenging levels to complete

Naudojantis Programa, galima sumokėti vietinę rinkliavą už automobilio stovėjimą Vilniaus mieste mobiliojo ryšio pagalba. Vietinė rinkliava už naudojimąsi Tarybos nustatytomis mokamomis vietomis automobiliams statyti yra Vilniaus miesto savivaldybės tarybos sprendimu nustatyta privaloma įmoka automobilių valdytojams (vairuotojams), galiojanti Vilniaus miesto savivaldybės teritorijoje. Programos pagalba sumokėta vietinė rinkliava negalioja privačiose aikštelėse. Programoje naudojamas subendrintas vietinės rinkliavos rinkimo laikas, todėl mokant vietinę rinkliavą būtina įsitikinti ar tuo metu yra renkama rinkliava. Rinkliavos rinkimo laikas nurodomas kelio ženklais ir papildomomis lentelėmis, todėl automobilio vairuotojas (valdytojas) mokėdamas vietinę rinkliavą vadovaujasi kelio ženklais. Naudodamasis Programa atsakote už tinkamą mokėjimo, vietinės rinkliavos zonos, mokamo laiko parinkimą, automobilio valstybinio numerio įvedimą bei kitus įvedamus ir pasirenkamus duomenis. Sumokėta vietinė rinkliava neužtikrina stovėjimo vietos ir jos nerezervuoja. Taip pat sumokėta vietinė rinkliava nesuteikia teisės statyti automobilį draudžiamųjų kelio ženklų galiojimo zonoje ar kitaip nesilaikyti Kelių eismo taisyklių. Pranešimas apie stovėjimo laiką, arba stovėjimo pradžios laikas registruojami vairuotojui neišlipant iš automobilio, o įregistruotu laikomas pranešimas, į kurį vairuotojas gavo teigiamą atsakymą. Pranešimas apie stovėjimo pabaigos laiką siunčiamas įlipus į automobilį prieš išvažiuojant. Naudodamasis Programa Jūs sutinkate, kad esate atsakingas už tinkamą ir teisingą mokamo stovėjimo laiko užsakymą ir nutraukimą. Parking, Vilnius, Lietuva, parkavimas, stovėjimas, automobilių, mokamas, automobilių stovėjimas, rinkliava, mobilus parkavimas SĮ „Susisiekimo paslaugos“ English: By using this program, you can pay a local fee for car parking in Vilnius city with the help of mobile connection. A local fee for using payable parking spaces, which are determined by the Council, is a mandatory payment for car managers (drivers) established under the decision of Vilnius City Municipality Council and valid in Vilnius city municipality area. A local fee paid with the help of the program is not valid in private car parking spaces. This program uses general fee collecting time. Consequently, when you pay a local fee, you must be sure that the fee is being collected at that time. Fee collecting time is indicated on road signs and additional tables, so a car driver (manager) follows road signs when he/she pays a local fee. When using the program, you are responsible for the proper selection of payment, local fee zone and time as well as for proper introducing of a car plate and other input or optional data. A paid local fee does not guarantee a parking space and does not reserve it. Also, it does not give the right to park a car in the zone having prohibitive road signs or violate Traffic rules in any other way. Notification about the whole parking time or the beginning of parking time is recorded without a driver getting out of a car, and the notification is considered to be recorded, to which a driver received a positive response. Notification about the end of parking time is sent when a driver gets into a car and before driving away. While using this program, you agree that you are responsible for proper and correct order and termination of payable parking time. It has never been easier to see what's going on overhead. All you have to do is pointing your phone to the plane in the sky like taking a photo to get all the detailed information about it. Do you want to impress your friends? Are you an aviation enthusiast or a plane spotter who wants to see what flight will arrive next at the local airport? Then this tool is the right choice for you. It is useful for anyone who wants aircraft information instantly and it is surely a nice gag too. There are various sites at the internet providing you with online radars. Why choose us? We are the FASTEST , because we restrict to targets you can really spot at your location. As we do not deliver a huge amount of unnecessary data, we are also the LEANEST when it comes to bandwith consumption. We are focussed on usability, not on eye candy. No unnecessary clicks with our unique concept. We are the QUICKEST when the question comes to find the plane. What could be easier than pointing your phone to the aircraft you want details for? Last but not least augmented reality is a crucial part of the usability concept even available in the base version. Need help? Visit our website http://radarworkx.com/en/home

description: A paramedic protocol application designed for York Region EMS paramedics. This protocol application allows paramedics to quickly access thier directives and bypass protocols. Both Advanced Care Paramedic(ACP) and Primary Care Paramedic(PCP) directives from the 2016 Ontario MOHLTC ALS Patient Care Standards v3.3 are included as well as tools that will assist in patient care. These tools include: - A weight converter. - Step by step Left Bundle Branch Block, Right Ventricular Infarct, Pericarditis and Left Ventricular Hypertrophy tools. - A tool to calculate when to discontinue nitroglycerin administration. - Charts for pediatric vitals including APGAR scoring chart - Driptronome - Creates a metronome tempo for custom drip rates. - Dopamine drip rate calculator. - Sim Monitor The application will also be updated with new or modified protocols as they become available.
release_text: New Features: Updated all existing Medical Directives to ALS Patient Care Standards, Version 3.3 Added Sim Monitor. Added Nebulized Salbutamol to Broncoconstriction Directives. Added Left Ventricular Hypertrophy Recognition Tool. Added Hyperkalemia Medical Directive (ACP). Updated STEMI Bypass Directive (Jan 2015). Added Pericarditis Recognition Tool. Added Adult Analgesia Medical Directive (PCP and ACP). Added Pediatric Analgesia Medical Directive (ACP). Added Opioid Toxicity Directive (PCP).

GedStar Pro (now totally FREE!) works with a genealogy program on your PC to show all the details of your family history. Converts directly from "The Master Genealogist" and "Legacy Family Tree", or from a GEDCOM file. Displays all your data including events, notes, sources, repositories, and photos. Some product-specific features are also available, such as the research log or to-do list. There are four basic views: Personal Details; Family Group; Ancestor Tree; and Descendant Tree. There are several ways to navigate up and down a line of descent, and to search for specific people. An extensive menu of other features is available, such as for viewing your complete family photo gallery. Includes the "On This Day" widget as part of the GedStar Pro app with the new name "GedStar Today". This app requires the use of a free Windows conversion program, which is available from our website. A sample database is included with the Android app so you can explore the user interface without having to convert your own data. The database is stored on your device's internal memory and there are no limits on the number of people or amount of other data. It has been tested on a database of over 40,000 individuals.
release_text: > Full-size photo view can be zoomed and dragged. > Support Android 6.0 permission behavior.

description: Financial CalcIt! is a collection of useful calculators to help you making important financial decisions, such as mortgage payment, accelerated loan pay off, house/loan affordability, loan comparison, refinance, CD/saving analyzer, tip calculator, rental ROI, auto lease or buy, wage/salary converter, etc. You can save any of the calculations and load them later, share it with free or email to yourself. Many users gave this app a low rate because not all calculators are enabled in this free version. I can understand but that's unfair to us. Anyway, in the new 2.0 release, instead of prevent you from using some more advanced calculators, we will allow you to use them by showing a full screen ads. If you don't like to see any ads, you can always upgrade to the full version which has no ads, but at least now you can use all the calculators.
release_text: v2.1 support android lollipop, added 2014 tax data v2.0 in this free version, we allow the usage of all 20 financial calculators by showing ads to support our development effort. redesigned new interface that looks great on android 4.0 and above. fixed many bugs, update the tax to use 2013 data v1.1 remove background, updated tax bracket using 2010 data

description: The ★★BESTSELLING★★ Baccarat game on the Apple App Store and Windows Store with ❖❖MILLIONS❖❖ of downloads is here on Android. Baccarat is a popular and easy to play Casino game with only three possible outcomes, i.e the 'Player', 'Banker' and 'Tie'. The objective of the player is to get a total card value closest to nine as possible without exceeding it. The Player can bet on the Banker, Player or Tie positions. In a game, two cards are dealt in two hands on the Baccarat table, one of which is the Banker's hand and the other the Player's hand. The player simply has to bet on either hand that they think will get a value closer to 9. ✔ Baccarat Earn Daily bonus everyday! ✔ Earn Bonuses by inviting your friends and sharing on Facebook ✔ Great looking optimized graphics for phones and tablets

description: Experience retro gaming at its best on-the-go with Space Ace on your Android devices! Both the phone and tablet editions included for one low price! Immerse yourself in the visually stunning world of hand-drawn animation adapted from the original smash hit arcade classic. Transferred from the original high definition master film, you’ll experience this fully arcade authentic experience right in the palm of your hand. Simply press on the direction pad to guide our hero Ace in the correct direction. Use your ray gun to take on all that the Evil Commander Borf throws your way. This version of Space Ace is fully compatible with Android 1.6 through to the current release. In fact we’ve included full compatibility for phones and tablets! We’ve even remastered the footage for a variety of screen resolutions so all devices can experience Space Ace in all its glory. Please note that we recommend you utilizing Wi-Fi connection to download Space Ace. Though downloading the full game may take some time after the initial download, you’re in for an awesome retro gaming experience. Enjoy! Reversi is a strategy board game for two players, played on an 8×8 board Players take turns placing discs on the board with their assigned color. During a play, any discs of the opponent's color that are in a straight line and bounded by the disc just placed and another disc of the current player's color are turned over to the current player's color. The object of the game is to have the majority of discs turned to display your color when the last playable empty square is filled. The game begins with 4 disks placed in a square in the middle of the grid, two facing white side up, two pieces with the dark side up, with same-colored disks on a diagonal with each other. The dark player moves first. Game features: - game statistics - difficulty game levels - choice of discs color - flip counts

app_name: くっつき猫カフェ。ネコ店長の育成ゲーム
description: 猫がお客さんに”くっついて”癒す新感覚の動物無料育成ゲーム！ ネコが好きな方、ねこが中毒の方からそうでない方まで 一風変わった猫とのコミュニケーションしてみませんか？ ■次回アップデート情報（6月予定) ・猫とおもちゃで遊べる機能 ・カフェランクの上限を増加 ・店員の追加 ・漫画の追加 ・２階の増築 ●○●○●○●○ゲーム概要●○●○●○●○ どこかの国のどこかの街でひっそりと経営しているネコカフェ。 その猫カフェはなんと『ねこが店員』なのです。 出してくれるメニューもお会計も猫が全てやっています。 ●○●○●○●○ゲーム内容●○●○●○●○ ≪業務マニュアル（遊び方）≫ ①「お客さん」をタップしくっつきます 　　　　　　　　　↓ ②「お客さん」のハートのメーターがたまっていきます 　　　　　　　　　↓ ③ハートのメーターが満タンになったら「お客さん」が満足し帰っていきます 　　　　　　　　　↓ ④タップでお金を回収し、食器を片付けます（お金をタップすると食器は自動的に消えます） ≪体力≫ ・接客をしていくと体力が減ってしまいます ・『休憩部屋』に行くと体力が回復します ・「おやつ」をあげるとさらに早く体力回復します ≪ネコレベル≫ ・接客していくと「人数」に応じてネコレベルがアップして色々な『しぐさ』を覚えます。 ★『しぐさ』について ・しぐさはカフェで店内にいるお客さんすべてを一瞬で満足させることができます ・しぐさをすると体力が普通よりも多く減ってしまいます ≪カフェランク≫ ・接客していくと「人数」に応じてカフェランクが上がります ・ランクが上がると『マンガ』『ネコ店員』が増えていきます ★『ネコ店員』について ・ランクが上がっていくと猫が仲間になります（アップデートで増えていきます） ・うまくローテーションしお店を回していきましょう ★『マンガ』について ランクが上がるごとに１つの物語が増えていきます ≪ショップ≫ ・ねこの「おやつ」、「模様替えアイテム」、「席」、「増築」を購入することができます ★『席』について ・カフェ内の席数を増やすことができます（来店するお客さんの数が増えます） ★『増築』について ・お店を広くすることができます（階数が増えます） ～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～ 暇つぶしにもなる育成ゲーム。しかも無料でかわいいゆるキャラ風味のねこのキャラクターが出てきます。 もちろん動物が好きな方もそうですが、カフェの雰囲気や癒されたいという方、 漫画がよみたいけれど買うお金がない方にもとてもおすすめです。 ちょっと変わったアクションで見ているだけでも楽しめますので暇を持て余してる人にもおすすめです。 ～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～

description: From the graphic designer of "LUMI" selected by Apple for the "app of the week", Dark Guardians is the most epic adventure game on the App Store. Between a runner game and a rhythm game, Dark Guardians awakens all your senses. Fight monsters of darkness and travel across fantastic and mystical landscapes. Game Features: -Tons of beautiful Environments -Outstanding music by Valentin Lafort -Upgrade your Hero -Summon the legendary Dark Horse

The sequel to last year's fantastic Hidden Object game, Mystery Venue! Tamalaki presents: Tour around a mysterious town in Hidden Object Mystery Venue 2! Brace yourself as you enter this secret venue bravely, as our previous explorers say there is no turning back once you get in! Game Features: - Play through 150 exciting levels in ARCADE mode! That is more than 4 hours of fun Hidden Objects search! - More than 10 distinct Game Modes: offering you truly different experience through the game! - Invite everyone to play by creating a new profile for each of them! - More than 15 gorgeous scenes, each featuring mysterious landscapes full of secrets. - Match 3 Minigame: When you want to take a quick break from searching for Hidden Objects, play the exciting Match 3 mini game! - Zoom feature: Help you look at smaller items! - Extras: 6 exciting Game Modes are available under Extras menu when you just want a quick session! This app is ad-supported. If you like to support development for this game, you may choose to upgrade to full version from within the game. Notes: - Some scenes may look a bit darker and harder to find items. It is advised to adjust your device's brightness when this happens. - There are known issues with devices that are overloaded with apps. - Over time, your device's performance may degrade. To ensure maximum performance, try restarting your device prior to playing our game. - If you have problem installing the game, please reach us for help. Our goal is to make you fully happy with our game quality! If you found any problems with our games, please report to us! Please do send us email and we'll respond ASAP. We will respond to every game feedback and fix them as soon as we can!

This app is designed for those who want to time and keep track of their speedcube (and other similar puzzles) solving times. ***** THIS IS NOT A GAME APPLICATION - IT IS MEANT SOLELY TO KEEP TRACK OF SOLVING TIMES ***** Features Logs your solve times independently for 6 puzzle types (2x2x2, 3x3x3, 4x4x4, 5x5x5, 6x6x6, 7x7x7) with 4 variations (Regular, One-handed, With feet, Blindfolded) Keeps statistics of your last 5, last 12, and lifetime best/worst/average for each puzzle type and variation Valid World Cube Association scramble sequences for all 6 puzzle types Optional inspection timer (User configurable on inspection time) Editable history - remove unwanted entries in your solve history No ads

description: "Time Lapse Buddy" is an application for calculating time lapse photography parameters and for simulating time lapse session (including timer and live count of clip lenght seconds recorded, num. shots taken, ...). The input parameters are: Frame rate(clip frame rate. Exp.: 24 fps), Clip lenght (duration of the output time lapse video), Event duration (the lenght of the time lapse session. Exp.: sunrese duration), Interval (interval between shots taken). You can fill out three parameters and calculate the fourth. To calculate certain parameter press the "calculator" button beside the input field. Once you have calculated desired parameter just "swipe" left to enter the Timer screen. When pressing the "Start" button, the timer will count down from your selected or calculated "Event duration". You will monitor the remaining time, current clip lenght and number of shots taken. Meanwhile (timer running), you can freely "swipe" back to calculator page and experiment with different parameters - the timer will continue running with initial parameters. If you stop and restart the timer, then the new calculated values will became valid. NOTE: The "back" button is disabled to prevent accidenntly stopping the application while the timer is running. You must exit the app through the option menu. You should add this application to "Ignore list" in your task manager, if you want to keep it running in the background. This is a phone version and is not optimized for tablets. Enjoy "timelapsing" ...
release_text: -Timer running in the background even if the app is not active. -Vibrate 5 sec. before time lapse session end. -Some bug fixes. - NOT DESIGNED FOR TABS!

description: The game which has been loved all over the world is now in seasons mode! Flap the little wings of the poor flappy birds to guide them to fly through all kinds of obstacles, get as far as possible and collect their eggs. Keep flapping, collect coins along the way, grab power-ups and use the coins to unlock all seasons, change your bird skin and upgrade your power-ups. Increase the challenge level with your friends by unlocking the Advanced season, where there are no eggs or power-ups, separate score just for the advanced players! The chase is on! Floppy Bird Seasons is an entertaining game for anyone into infinity running and endless games. Game Features: - Simple one touch controls: Tap to flap! - Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master - Bird Shop - Different Seasons - Beautiful graphics - Flappy Bird style game - Accomplish 19 Achievements - Submit your scores with Google play leaderboards and compare you scores with your Google+ circles How to Play: - Tap anywhere on the screen to fly higher, and beat your own score! WARNING: Floppy Bird Seasons is insanely addictive, very simple but high degree of difficulty and challenge, don't get angry and be careful not to smash your valuable mobile phone!

description: CENTURY 21 Mobile brings the most accurate and up to date real estate information right to your phone! With CENTURY 21 Mobile, you have access to all CENTURY 21 homes for sale and MLS listings across the U.S. You don’t have to be working with a CENTURY 21 real estate agent or broker to start searching with this powerful app. Use CENTURY 21 anytime, anywhere to pull up homes for sale around you using the GPS search or find homes based on address, city or zip code. You can narrow your search results by selecting the property type you’re looking for, your price range, the number of bedrooms and bathrooms and the distance. CENTURY 21 will show you all the details you want to know about a property, including price, square footage, estimated mortgage, taxes, features, descriptions, pictures, maps, directions to the property and more! Save your favorite homes to view later. You can also text or email listings to your friends. If you have questions or want a tour of the home for sale, press the “Contact” feature to contact a CENTURY 21 Real Estate representative who can assist you. Share the app with any cell phone user using the “Share this App” feature located on the main menu.

description: It's up to you. Evil Fluffs have invaded, blanketing city after city with snow in an effort to make winter permanent. Do you have what it takes to save the world from never ending snow? SnowBomber is a fast paced game that's sure to get your blood pumping. How else will you fend of frostbite? Armed with only your slingshot and your guts, it's up to you to protect us all from being overrun by Fluffs. Angry Birds + Fruit Ninja meets Winter . The result? Gameplay that's simple, fun and totally addicting!

description: ¿Eres un autentico fanático de "Como conocí a vuestra madre - CCAVM" (How I met your mother - HIMYM)? ¿Serás capaz de desbloquear todos los logros de este juego? La dinámica del juego es realmente sencilla, se trata de completar los diferentes niveles contestando correctamente todas las preguntas. Conforme vaya completando el juego se irán desbloqueando diferentes logros, secretos y curiosidades de la serie televisiva. El juego consta de un temporizador de 15 segundos por pregunta, si en el tiempo establecido no se ha respondido correctamente finalizará el nivel. El juego consta de un nivel con todas las preguntas disponibles para realizar puntuaciones, donde solo tendrá una oportunidad para responder todas las preguntas y proclamarse el rey del trivial. Es posible que al basarse en la traducción de España haya términos alterados de la serie original. Preguntas sobre como conocí a vuestra madre la serie televisiva tv, consta de niveles y tiempo. Los personajes principales son Barney Stinson, Ted Mosby, Marshall Eriksen, Lily Aldrin y Robin Scherbatsky. Es un juego de quiz, un trivia digamos. Are you a real fan of "How I Met Your Mother - CCAVM" (How I Met Your Mother - HIMYM)? Can you unlock all the achievements in this game? The dynamics of the game is really simple, it comes complete different levels correctly answering all questions. As you complete the game you will unlock various achievements, secrets and curiosities of the TV series. The game has a timer of 15 seconds per question, if on time has not been answered correctly end the level. The game consists of a standard with all the questions available for scores, which only have a chance to answer all questions and proclaim himself king of trivial. It is possible that by relying on the translation of Spain has altered terms of the original series. Questions about how I met your mother tv television series consists of levels and time. The main characters are Barney Stinson, Ted Mosby, Marshall Eriksen, Lily Aldrin and Robin Scherbatsky. It is a quiz game a trivia say.
release_text: *Añadido 3 nuevos niveles, 2 niveles de 40 preguntas cada uno y 1 nivel con el total de preguntas a modo desafío con puntuaciones. *Añadidas 80 nuevas preguntas de las temporadas 4 y 5. *Nueva recompensa del blog de Barney. *Enlace con Scoreloop para generar listas de puntuaciones automáticas.

Panacea Database allows you to open Microsoft Access databases. We currently handle: * Microsoft Access 2000 * Microsoft Access 2002 * Microsoft Access 2003 * Microsoft Access 2007 * Microsoft Access 2010 * Microsoft Access 2013 * Microsoft Access 2016 (some limited support, we are working on expanding this) Panacea Database can handle the ACCDB or MDB (Jet) format. Panacea Database is written for devices using newer versions of Android (Lollipop, Marshmellow etc.), but we also have some limited support for Android devices running older versions of Android. Panacea Database is completely free. Panacea Database makes use of the library which is under the Apache 2.0 license. It also makes use of the Apache commons-land, commons-logging and log4j libraries, which are under the Apache 2.0 license.

*** Why read your child a story, when you can make him a part of it? *** Transport your child to Candyland, where the Color Dragons need help coloring the Earth, and defeating Manny, the evil black dragon, whose only goal is to darken the world with his black fire. The Candyland Dragons brings storytelling apps to the future. • Vivid animations, and immersive functionality will include your child in adventures with four loveable, colorful dragons. • Children will love solving simple puzzles, collecting candy, and completing animations that will put them in charge of the progression of the story. • Younger children will enjoy being read to, while older children’s reading skills will be reinforced by the read-along narration. The Candyland Dragons is more than just a fun game. Parents will love the educational benefits of an interactive storytelling game. Simple drag and drop functionality will: • Increase your child’s dexterity • Teach color identification and developmentally crucial matching skills • Kids will have a blast all while learning about bullying, self-confidence, and more! With a colorful cast of characters, the story comes to life at your child’s fingertips: • Randy the Red Color Dragon loves red candy, apples, strawberries, and smiling. • Gracie the Green Dragon loves green candy, growing grass, and shady trees. • Brandon the Blue Dragon loves blue candy, swimming in cool water, and blowing bubbles. • Yop, the Yellow Dragon, and the smallest of the dragons, loves yellow candy, sunshine, daffodils, cozy fires, and toasting marshmallows. • Manny, the Black Dragon, loves black candy, cloudy days, dark skies, and hates everything colorful. What are you waiting for? Download this app now, and feed your child’s imagination with a foursome of friendly, colorful dragons that will bring magical education to your lives!

AndBankBook is a VERY basic account tracking program to help you keep track of your bank accounts. It allows for transferring funds between accounts, as well as creating as many accounts as you like. For an AD-free version see AndBankBook Pro.

BlackJack brings the classic casino card game to your Android device. Blackjack tests your luck and your skill as you play against the house for imaginary winnings. Real Blackjack's clean and intuitive interface gets the chips flowing quickly. You begin with a bank of $500. Tap the chips at the bottom of your screen to place your bet. Tap Deal and your hand appears. Blackjack follows standard casino rules, such as the house must take a card on 16 and can't take a card on 17. When your hand is dealt you have the choices: take a hit, stand, or double down. Once the hand is over, touch your device's screen to place another bet, and play another hand. Features: -Play the classic Black Jack card game -Double down tempting hands -Keep a running total of your winnings -Smooth Play -Great Graphics NOTE: This casino card game is not associated with any real casino and was made ONLY for fun. All money amounts shown are FUN money.

description: Wenn Sie Hilfe beim Lösen Ihres Kreuzworträtsels benötigen, dann ist diese App genau das Richtige für Sie. Geben Sie einfach den Suchbegriff aus Ihrem Kreuzworträtsel ein und starten die Wortsuche. Mit derzeit mehr als 900.000 eingetragenen Wörtern gibt es kaum ein gesuchtes Wort, welches nicht zu finden ist. Sind Ihnen einige der Buchstaben des Lösungswortes bekannt, dann können Sie alternativ auch direkt nach dem Lösungswort suchen. Dazu einfach die Anzahl der Buchstaben auswählen, die bekannten Buchstaben angeben und die Suche starten. Es werden sämltiche Wörter und deren genaue Definitionen aufgelistet, die im Zusammenhang mit dem von Ihnen eingegebenen Suchbegriff stehen. Probieren Sie es einfach aus und empfehlen Sie Rätsel-Hilfe bitte weiter. If you need help to resolve a crossword puzzle, then this app is just right for you. Simply enter the search term from your crossword and start the word search. With currently more than 900,000 registered words, there is hardly a searched word which can not be found. Are you some of the letters of the solution word known, then you can alternatively also search for the solution word. Simply select the number of letters, specify the known character and start the search. It will be listed sämltiche words and their precise definitions that are associated with the search term you entered. Just try it out and recommend puzzles help please continue.
release_text: Version 0.2 - Wortsuche funkioniert jetzt auch mit Umlauten.

description: Retrieve real-time 7-day hyperlocal point weather forecasts and current weather conditions for worldwide locations from NOAA NWS, Environment Canada & Forecast.io (creators of DarkSky) based on your current location or any location in the world. Not only are NOAA forecasts the most accurate, they provide unique point forecasts for every square mile which take into consideration all the variables affecting the weather at that point, such as altitude. This is especially useful in locations with highly dynamic weather patterns and is a great tool for being outdoors. -View forecast & current conditions for your current location. -View forecast & current conditions for any location in the world by map. -Save favorite locations to quickly retrieve forecasts for them. -Hourly forecast -Animated radar, cloud cover, precipitation & wind imagery over Google Maps -Map measuring tool to measure distance and elevation -Hazardous weather alerts -Current conditions notification -Home screen widget -Light and Dark Material themes -Optimized for tablets -Android Wear support An ad-free version of this app is also available: NOAA Weather+ https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pandamonium.noaaweatherplus Please e-mail me below with any bug reports or features requests. Thanks!
release_text: 6.1.3 * UI update to measuring tool 6.1 * Google+ and Identity permission no longer required to sign-in to sync your locations! * As always, please e-mail me with issues you find with the app: pandamoniumsoftware@gmail.com

description: This Oxford University Press source of information, Oxford Handbook of Psychiatry, third edition, is developed by MedHand Mobile Libraries. Improve your performance with relevant, valid material which is accessed quickly and with minimal effort in the palm of your hand using MedHand’s patented technology. • Provides practical advice on all aspects of general adult psychiatry and other psychiatric sub-specialties • Updated to ensure direct relevance for trainees and students in psychiatry as well as psychiatry professionals • Fully revised from a disorder-based to presentation-based format New to this edition • Substance misuse and forensic psychiatry chapters fully revised to ensure direct relevance for trainees as well as psychiatry professionals • Fully revised to cover latest changes in mental health legislation, and major changes in psychiatric practice, training and examinations • New information included on Adult ADHD, new drugs of abuse (e.g. GBL, GHB, mephodrone), coverage of assessment/treatment orders, and clinical decision making in a prison setting Fully revised and updated for the new edition, the Oxford Handbook of Psychiatry provides the most up-to-date information clinically relevant to the doctor on the ground. Using a presentation-based format it provides detailed advice on clinical decision making after diagnosis. This handbook is an indispensable companion for any professional working in psychiatric medicine. Covering all major psychiatric conditions and sub-specialties, this handbook provides practical and comprehensive guidelines and in-depth coverage of psychiatric assessment, psychopathology, evidence-based practice, therapeutic issues, and transcultural psychiatry. It is indexed alphabetically by ICD-10 / DSM-IV classification codes and acute presentations for quick access. It reflects the recent major changes to psychiatric training and examination as well as the latest drug information. Reviewed by experienced clinicians, and revised by Specialist Trainees, this handbook not only gives expert advice for psychiatry professionals, but is also directly relevant to trainees in psychiatry. For the third edition, new information includes guidance on Adult ADHD, information on new drugs of abuse (e,g, GBL, GHB, mephodrone), and clinical decision-making in the prison setting. With such broad coverage and depth of guidance, this is the must-have pocket guide for all professionals and trainees working in psychiatry. Readership: Specialist trainees starting psychiatric training, clinical medical students, psychiatric trainees approaching professional exams (e.g. MRCPsych in the UK), and psychiatric specialists Audience:Oxford Handbook of Psychiatry is intended for a UK audience as well as other areas which follow UK medical practice including Europe, Australia, the Middle East, India and East Asia. Authors:Edited by David Semple and Roger Smyth ________________________________________ MedHand Mobile Libraries offers a SUBSCRIPTION FREE application without edition upgrade. The apps enables you to make notes, picture notes, search, add bookmarks and review what you previously been reading. The app also contains a set of medical calculators. MedHand delivers what you need, trusted knowledge at the point of care! Offering most trusted and well recognized medical guidelines provided by excellent publishers like Oxford University Press, McGraw-Hill, PDR Network LLC, Wiley and more.
